loans.name: Khaticha

texts.ru:
Эту женщину зовут Хатича. Она трудолюбивая женщина. Хатича занимается земледелием, где она арендует 1 га земельного участка возле дома. Хатича три года назад начала заниматься растениеводческой деятельностью. Она на половину земли посадила лук и на другой части Хатича планирует посадить картофель. Хатича радуется, когда получает хороший урожай, потому что доход от этого бизнеса обеспечивает условия жизни  ее семьи.  Ей надо купить качественных семян картофеля и минеральных удобрение, чтобы получить богатый  урожай, по этой причине Хатича обратилась за кредитом, чтобы продолжать продвигаться дальше. Это кредит поможет ей улучшить и расширить земледелие. 
Хатича проживает вместе семьей в районе Кубадиён. Она замужем. У нее четверо детей. Дети учатся в средней школе. Хатича надеется на Вашу помощь и считает, что с Вашей помощью она сможет закончить посев и на следующий сезон собрать хороший урожай.
texts.en:
This hard-working woman's name is Khaticha. She grows farm crops on a leased land plot of 1 ha [2.5 acres] near her house. Khaticha started doing farming three years ago. She has planted onions on one half of her land and intends to plant potatoes on the other half. Khaticha is happy when she is able to produce a large harvest because the income from this business supports her family. Khaticha needs to buy quality potato seeds and mineral fertilizers in order to  have a high yield of crops. This is why Khaticha has applied for a loan to keep moving ahead. This loan will allow her to improve and expand her farming business.

Khaticha lives with her family in the Qubadiyon region. She is married and has four children. Her children attend secondary school. Khaticha is hoping for your help and believes that, with your help, she will be able to finish planting and enjoy a large harvest next season.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy and sell vegetable business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 5000 through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of vegetables to sell for her buy and sell vegetables business.

Emily has been in this business for 5 years. Emily earns more income from food vending.

Emily has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of vegetables to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: This loan will be used to buy and build a bathroom, septic tank, a toilet and water sources at their home to improve of access to water and sanitation for their family.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 58 years old and married with nine children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock like soap, shampoo, rice, etc. to sell.

Erlinda has borrowed and paid 8 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 3 years and also earns an income from buy and sell charcoal, rice and dried fish.

She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock like soap, shampoo, rice, etc. to sell

loans.name: Vivían Alejandra

texts.es:
Vivían es una señorita muy amable y generosa, ella tiene 25 años, soltera y vive en una comunidad de Sololá. 
Vivian por ser una persona responsable llego alcanzar la meta, ella es una persona profesional y por su preparación academia, ahora trabaja para una  empresa financiera desde hace dos años, de esta manera ella genera sus ingresos económicos, su objetivo es ayudar a sus padres con los gastos de la casa o de  la necesidad que se le presente a su familia  

Vivian con el afán de ayudar a sus padres,  ella solicita un prestamo de siete mil quetzales que le servirá para remodelar su vivienda , ya que para Vivian la casa es un lugar donde convive toda la familia y es necesario tenerlo en buenas condiciones, Pues con lo que genera con su trabajo estaría pagando dicho prestamo. 
Vivian después de culminar este proyecto, los sueños de esta señorita es seguir estudiando una carrera universitaria hasta graduarse. Vivian tiene las esperanzas de conseguir el prestamo, para empezar a trabajar lo anhelado, ella es una chica que se destaca por su amabilidad.
texts.en:
Vivian is a very friendly and generous young woman. She is 25 years old and single. She lives in a community of Sololá.

By being a responsible person, Vivian has reached her goal. She is a professional person, and because of her academic preparation, she has now worked for a financial business for two years. In this way she generates her economic income. Her goal is to help her parents with the household expenses or the necessities that present themselves to her family.

Vivian, with the eagerness to help her parents, is applying for a loan of seven thousand quetzales, which will serve her to remodel her house, since for Vivian the house is a place where all the family lives together, and it's necessary to have it in good condition. She would be paying for this loan with what she generates with her work.

After finishing this project, Vivian's dreams are to continue studying in a university program until she graduates. Vivian has hopes of obtaining this loan to begin to work on what is desired. She is a young woman who stands out for her friendliness.

loans.use: to remodel her home

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and build a bathroom, septic tank and a toilet at their home to improve access to water and sanitation for their family.

loans.name: Jonna

texts.en:
Jonna manages a mango fruit production business. This is how she makes a living to support her husband and her family. She will buy mango fruit trees for production to enable her to supply mangoes to fruit stands in the province and neighboring cities. She always ensures that she will have the needed herbicides for more produce. 

She has applied for a loan from PMPC for the needed capital. The loan is intended to buy herbicides and fruit vitamins. Someday, she hopes to buy at least 5 hectares of land to plant more grafted mango trees.

loans.use: to buy herbicides and fruit vitamins.

loans.name: Sidikjon

texts.ru:
Сидик вместе семьей  проживает в районе Шахритус. Ему всего 36 лет. Он женат и отец двоих детей. У него есть два младшего брата и две сестры. Его братья не женаты и они находятся на заработках в Российской Федерации, потому что они не нашли себе работу на Родине и у них не было другого выбора, чем оставить родных для их же обеспечения. 
Сидик не смог преступить и уехать, он остался и не хотел оставлять родных и надеялся, что сможет найти хорошую работу. Сидик решил начать свой бизнес и стать успешный предпринимателем и планирует обеспечить работой других жителей, чтобы они не уезжали в далекие края. Сидик планирует начать животноводческую деятельность. Он будет покупать несколько молодых телят, откармливать их в течение 30-35 дней и после  откорма  перепродать их на скотном рынке. Таким образом, он будет собирать капитал. Из-за нехватки денежных средств на приобретения первых телят и бычков, он обратилась за кредитом. Чтобы начать бизнес Сидик нуждается в финансовой поддержке, только Вы сейчас можете ему помочь.
texts.en:
Sidik and his family live in the Shahrituz district. He is only 36 years old. He is married and a father of two children. He has two younger brothers and two sisters. His brothers are not married and work in the Russian Federation because they could not find work in their native land, and did not have a choice other than leaving their relatives in order to support them.

Sidik could not leave. He stayed because he did not want to leave his family and hoped to find a good job. Sidik decided to start his own business, become a successful entrepreneur and plans to provide work for other residents, so that they would not have to go to distant lands for work. Sidik plans to start an animal husbandry business. He will buy several young calves, fatten them up for 30-35 days and, after fattening them up, sell them at a livestock market. This is how he will gain capital. Due to a shortage in money to buy the first calves and bulls, he requested a loan. Sidik needs financial support to start his business, and only You can now help him.

loans.use: to buy several calves in order to start his own animal husbandry business

loans.name: Faithful

texts.en:
Faithful is 24 years old with two children.

Faithful earns a living by farming sugarcane in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 5,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Faithful has been farming sugarcane for two years and also earns additional income from rice retailing.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Fely

texts.en:
Fely is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a pig fattening business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Fely has been in this business for 2 years. Fely earns more income from retailing gasoline, farming rice and sugarcane.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Fely has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
As a married parent of eight children, Juliet works hard to support her family. She has a business buying and selling vegetables in the Philippines, and she earns additional income from fattening pigs.

Juliet is borrowing 18,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of vegetables to reselll for her vegetable business. She successfully repaid her previous loan, and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Juliet has been sustaining her business activities through her past 29 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of vegetables to sell

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Marilou works hard to support her family. She has a business selling food in the Philippines, and she earns additional income from a general store and cafeteria. Marilou is borrowing 24,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food-vending business.

Marilou has been sustaining her business activities through her past 24 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and build a bathroom, septic tank and a toilet at their home to improve access to water and sanitation for their family.

loans.name: Joan

texts.en:
Joan has switched from selling snacks to selling "longganisa" (processed meat) and dried fish. Her business is doing well, as she doubled her time perfecting her own "longganisa" recipe and is driven by a passion for selling dried fish. With her husband's help, she has maximized her profits and keeps pursuing her goals for the good of her family.

The reason why Joan availed herself of another loan from PMPC was to buy more kilos of meat for her "longganisa" business as well as more stock of dried fish to sell. Today, Joan is able to help others engage in the retail business using her "longganisa," and they have been able to earn income for their own families as well.

loans.use: to buy more kilos of meat for her "longganisa" business and to buy additional stock of dried fish to sell

loans.name: Angelita

texts.en:
Angelita is from Bato, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She is 57 years old. She and her partner have three adult children. She joined Paglaum MPC in 2010, and she appreciates the co-op's programs and services. For a living, she engages in selling assorted fruits, vegetables, and dried fish in different barangays in the municipality of Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She has used her motorcycle as her only source of transportation; her husband is the driver. enabling her to reach the different barangays and sell her fruits, vegetables, and dried fish. This source of income has existed for 4 years now.

As Angelita needed additional working capital, she requested financial assistance from Paglaum MPC in an amount of 20,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to purchase more stock of assorted fruits, vegetables, and dried fish for resale. Through this purchase, she hopes to increase her income so she is able to provide for her family's daily needs. In the future, she hopes to arrange for a decent house for the family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of assorted fruits, vegetables, and dried fish for resale

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Fatima works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell ready to wear products business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming rice. Fatima is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase additional stock like shorts, shoes, etc. to sell for her buy-and-sell ready to wear products business.

Fatima has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock like shorts, shoes, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Marlyn

texts.en:
Marlyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. She is borrowing 20,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell for this business.

Marlyn has been in the fish-vending business for 15 years. She earns more income from a general store and prepaid mobile load and entertainment services. She successfully repaid her previous loan, and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Marlyn has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Melma

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Melma works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell vegetable business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from food vending and farming rice. Melma is borrowing PHP 5,000 through NWTF to purchase additional vegetables like carrots and eggplant to sell for her business.

Melma has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional vegetables like carrots and eggplant to sell.

loans.name: Ann

texts.en:
Ann is a brilliant, hardworking 57-year-old Kenyan lady whose home is on a small farmland in Kerugoya. She gets a lot of help and support running the business with her husband and their children. In a bid to expand her farm, Ann is seeking a KES 30,000 loan to purchase farm inputs, farm implements and animal feed.

Currently, she sells crops at Kerugoya Town. To boost the quantity of produce she sells, she needs a loan investment from Kiva lenders to purchase farm inputs such as seeds and fertilizer. She also needs to purchase tools and implements that will be used to work on the increased acreage. Ann also grows fodder for her cattle. With the loan, she will buy a wider range of feed from that available in the locality.

Ann will use any money made from this investment to help her husband meet the family's basic needs. She will also save for future investments in the business.

loans.use: To buy farm inputs, farm implements and animal feed.

loans.name: Ipah

texts.en:
Ipah is 50 years old and married. She lives with her husband and her sons. She has three sons, all of whom have a job to help the income of their family. Ipah is a food merchant, selling foods for breakfast and lunch. She helps her husband to increase their income.

She has asked for a loan from KPP-UMKM Syariah for 5,500,000 rupiah. This loan will be used to buy and build a bathroom, septic tank, a toilet and water sources at their home to improve access to water and sanitation for their family. She wants to have access to safe sanitation for families. Her family income is still not enough to build toilets and water sources by cash, but they are able to repay loans received.

She and her family want to live a healthy life with healthy sanitation. She is very grateful for the opportunity and wants to thank all of the lenders

loans.use: to buy and build a bathroom, septic tank, a toilet and water sources at their home to improve access to water and sanitation for their family.

loans.name: Fe

texts.en: Fe always has an enthusiasm for farming. She has cultivated their rice land in Plaridel and has yielded good earnings doing this type of work as the main source of income to sustain her family. Recently, she applied for a loan to pay for land and seedbed preparations and to purchase fertilizer. This will ensure that the rice field is ready for planting. Fe knew that she has to get things right to yield more income for this cropping season. In the future, Fe hopes to buy a rice thresher to cater threshing jobs during the cropping season for additional income. She deeply wishes to provide her family with a better life and a good education for her children.

loans.use: to pay for land and seedbed preparations and to purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Teofanes

texts.en: Teofanes is married and lives in Plaridel, Philippines. For a living, he cultivates a small rice land for their consumption and engages in selling firewood to the local community. Teofanes has been doing this for 15 years. He hopes to live comfortably, with simple yet comfortable living quarters for all of those in the family. Therefore, he applied for a loan to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks for house repair and expansion. Teofanes is a new member of PMPC. In the future, he hopes to save money for future emergencies. He wants nothing more than to live a happy and healthy life.

loans.use: to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks for house repair and expansion

loans.name: Maria Fe

texts.en:
Maria Fe is a married woman with six children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Maria Fe is 43 years old and has three children who are still in school.

Maria Fe has a business raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Maria Fe has been in this business for 15 years.  She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Marlyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Marlyn works hard to support her family.

She has a direct selling of Avon products business in the Philippines and earns additional income from a manicure and pedicure service. Marlyn is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to purchase more stocks of Avon products to sell for her direct selling of Avon products business.

Marlyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 17 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of Avon products to sell

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Hello, world! Meet Agnes, a very hardworking mother who is 40 years of age. She is a smallholder farmer from Maridadi, a remote village in the fertile highlands of the Kitale area of Kenya. This charming mother of six has been engaged in mixed farming for the past five years. She commands a lot of respect from fellow farmers in her village. Her main sources of income have been eggs, milk, maize, and a variety of food crops that she plants. Taking care of her poultry is an activity she finds very enjoyable. Feeding her poultry is her hobby. Poultry farming is a very profitable business venture in the Kitale region. Agnes has good knowledge of the market and has been taking advantage of the ready market. However, the demand is so high. Being a visionary woman, Agnes has always wanted to increase her poultry. 

She is seeking a loan to buy additional poultry. Accessing financial services for women is very difficult, but through institutions such as Kiva, enterprising women like Agnes will achieve their dreams and goals. Agnes believes that the key to increased egg production is proper feeding of poultry and taking good care of them. By ensuring that the poultry are fed well, she is guaranteed to reap the benefits. In addition to selling eggs and poultry meat, she will also sell poultry feathers that are commonly used to make earrings. The increased income will be used to improve her living conditions and to repay the loan.

loans.use: To buy additional poultry.

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Most of Kenya’s young people struggle to make their way in the world because of unemployment and the lack of capital. This is true for Christine, who is based in the Kitale area of Kenya and is a mother of six lovely children. She has been practicing mixed farming for the past 10 years. She has managed to earn a decent income. Her primary sources of income are crop farming, sheep farming and personal business, and through these ventures, she has been able to make ends meet. 

Christine and her family live in the Kitale area of Kenya, an area that is very fertile and has good weather patterns that support farming activities. Christine is very enterprising, and through farming, she has been able to support her family, although she has been facing challenges. That is why she is seeking a loan to buy farm implements that will assist her to produce more. 

With the loan, Christine will be able to completely turnaround her life because the production level on her farm will increase, and this means more income. Through the loan, she will be able to assure her family of improved living standards, and she is confident that the new profits will allow her to comfortably repay the loan. Christine intends to purchase more land through savings that she would have made, and this will assure her family of a brighter future.

Help out an enterprising Kenyan woman!

loans.use: To buy farm implements

loans.name: Redgiela

texts.en:
Redgiela is 30 years old and married with four children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a buy-and-sell ready to wear products business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock like sandals, shorts, socks, etc. to sell.

Redgiela has borrowed and paid back one loan from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the buy-and-sell ready to wear products business for one year and also earns an income from direct selling Avon products.

Redgiela aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock like sandals, shorts, socks, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Mernie

texts.en:
Mernie is 32 years old, married and has one child who is still in school.

Mernie is in the agricultural business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Mernie has been in this business for six years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Robelyn

texts.en:
Robelyn is 28 years old and married with two children who are in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock like sardines, noodles, milk, etc. to sell.

Robelyn has been in this business for five years.

In the future Robelyn would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock like sardines, noodles, milk, etc. to  sell.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 42 years old and married with three children. One child is still in school. Josephine works very hard to provide for them.

Josephine runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell like shampoo, coffee, noodles, canned goods, spices, etc.

Josephine has been in this business for 18 years.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell like shampoo, coffee, noodles, canned goods, spices, etc

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna is not looking for a job now, but even if she were to be hired, she says she "can only accept the position of sheep breeding consultant, not any other position.” Anna is a very honest, hardworking and dedicated farmer who hails from the Kapsowar area of Kenya, known to have the best weather patterns that favor crops and animal farming. Anna has so much experience in sheep farming, having done it for the past 10 years, that she is considered one of the best farmers in her village. Anna’s primary source of income is selling sheep meat, milk, eggs and crops.

Anna has space on her farm that is unused, and she wants to use it to keep sheep. She is kindly seeking a loan to buy sheep. This will help Anna to improve her living conditions and also the conditions of her children by providing them with a solid education, because education is the “key to success.” The Kapsowar area has a large population and a ready market for sheep meat (mutton) and wool. Hence, Anna will not have a problem selling the meat and increasing her income level. Anna is very disciplined with finances, and she is sure that, through accumulated profits, she will open a large mutton selling butchery and be able to pay back the loan on time.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Reina

texts.en:
Reina is 53 years old and lives in Dicoloc, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with two children now at their adult age.

Reina is engaged in a copra and charcoal buy-and-sell business. She’s been engaged in this business for four years already. She earns approximately PHP 10,000 each month doing this type of business activity which is so helpful to meet their basic needs. She has requested a loan to purchase additional stock of copra and charcoal for resale.

Reina has been a member of PMPC for almost four years. In the future, Reina hopes to expand her copra buying business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of copra and charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Jocely

texts.en: Jocely is from Usocan, Plaridel in the Philippines. She is married with three children. Her husband is a fisherman. Jocely manages their own fishing business and owns fish cages as well. She earns a good income each month doing this type of work, supporting the needs of her family, especially her children's education, until they graduate and secure their own jobs. She has requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to pay for the boat engine overhaul. In the future, Jocely hopes to buy another fishing boat to improve and expand her fishing business.

loans.use: to pay for the boat engine overhaul

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to increase the rice, flour, beans, meat, cooking oil, and charcoal for cooking the food.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 53 years old and married with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock like canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, etc.

Teresita has borrowed and paid back 22 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from direct selling personal collection products.

She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock like canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Welen Rose

texts.en:
Welen Rose is 28 years old and married with four children, one of whom is in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Welen Rose runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, soap, etc.

Welen Rose has been in this business for one year.

In the future Welen Rose would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, soap, etc.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Seven years ago Jane started farming on a small inherited piece of land in the Litein area of Kenya. Today, this humble mother sells milk, eggs, tea and a variety of food crops. She is a passionate farmer and, because of the immense knowledge she has of farming, she commands a lot of respect from other farmers in her village. Dairy farming is close to her heart and every day she wakes up to milk her cow and that makes her very proud.

Although she makes profits through milk selling, she lacks a proper dairy unit and she is seeking a loan to build a modern dairy unit. Through the loan she will have a humble time milking and feeding her cow. A good dairy unit provides a good place where cows can relax and also prevent them from getting diseases that may arise because of being exposed to harsh weather conditions such as rain. Jane believes that through this loan her living conditions will change because she is going to have an increase in milk production. She will save money that she used to spend on treating her cows because she lacked a good dairy unit. Jane waits for your kindness.

Invest in a Kenyan woman with great aspirations and ambition to succeed in life!

loans.use: To construct a modern dairy unit

loans.name: José Nehemias

texts.es:
Nehemías, de 33 años de edad, tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar hasta tercer año de bachillerato, está acompañado y su pareja trabaja en una empresa, desempeñando el cargo de oficios varios, es padre de un hijo de 10 años de edad, actualmente su mamá vive en su casa.

Nehemías, trabaja de marinero desde hace 6 años, anteriormente trabajaba como ayudante del barco, luego paso a trabajar en el puesto que hoy en día realiza, su trabajo está ubicado a una distancia de un kilómetro, no tiene horario de trabajo porque hay días que trabaja en turnos de noche y otros de días.

Nehemías, esta solicitando el crédito para comprar cemento, madera para la construcción de una represa, pues él también trabaja en su tiempo libre en la pesca de camarones, de esta manera piensa mejorar su condición de vida, ya que le ayudara a tener mayores ingresos para su familia.

Nehemías, sueña en poder construir una casa grande, para poder vivir con su familia más cómodamente.
texts.en:
Nehemías is 33 years old and studied up to third year of high school. He has a partner, who has a job with a private business. Nehemías is a father to one son, ten years old. Nehemías’ mother also lives with the family.

Nehemías has been working as a sailor for six years. Previously he worked as a shipmate and then moved into the job he has now. His work is one kilometre away. He has no set working hours. He sometimes works dayshifts, sometimes nightshifts.

Nehemías is applying for a loan in order to buy cement and wood to build an artificial pond. In his spare time he fishes for shrimp and, through this work, wants to improve his quality of life and help to earn a higher income for his family.

Nehemías dreams of building a big house where he can live more comfortably with his family.

loans.use: to buy cement and wood to build an artificial pond.

loans.name: Delmy Del Carmen

texts.es:
Delmy de 31 años de edad, estudió hasta 8° grado, ella abandonó sus estudios debido a la falta de recursos económicos, decidió dedicarse a trabajar para poder ayudar a sus padres con los gastos del  hogar, está soltera y es madre de 5 hijos, el primero tiene 14 años y estudia 7° grado, la segunda tiene 12 años y estudia 5° grado, tiene gemelas de 8 años de edad las cuales no viven con ella ya que nacieron en otro país y no las puede ver hasta que tengan la mayoría de edad ya que ella buscó superación en USA pero fue repatriada a su país de origen y no la dejaron traer a sus hijas, y la última tiene 5 años y estudia kinder, en su casa vive junto a sus padres, hijos y 2 hermanas.

Ella se dedica a los oficios del hogar desde que era una niña, aprendió esto de su madre y abuela, trabaja en una casa de una vecina ya que tiene que estar pendiente de sus hijos y no se puede ir demasiado lejos y el horario es bastante accesible para realizar los que aceres de su casa.

Ella solicita este crédito para comprar bloques, arena, cemento, hierro y pagar mano de obra para reparar su casa.

Ella desea poder ver a sus hijos graduarse en carreras universitarias así como también desea poder estar al lado de sus hijas de las cuales fue separadas cuando tenían 6 meses de haber nacido y tiene casi 8 años que no los ha podido ver, desea tener a todos sus hijos juntos y construir su casa donde pueda vivir con ellos.
texts.en:
Delmy is 31 years old and has an eighth grade education. She left school owing to the lack of money at home and decided to start working in order to be able to help her parents pay household expenses. Delmy is single and a mother to five children, the eldest of whom is 14 and in seventh grade; the next is 12 years old and in fifth grade; the youngest is five years old and attending kindergarten. Delmy also has eight-year-old twin girls but they live abroad; Delmy cannot see them until they are over 18 as she had moved abroad in search of better opportunities in the US but was repatriated to her home country and could not bring her daughters with her. Delmy lives with her parents, sisters and children.

Delmy has been taking care of the household chores since she was a girl, having learned how to do them from her mother and grandmother.  Delmy works at a neighbour’s house. She cannot work too far away as she needs to look after her children. The hours are good and allow her to do her own chores.

Delmy is applying for this loan in order to buy bricks, sand, cement and iron, and to pay labourers to carry out repairs to her house.

Delmy wants to see her children graduate from university and to be by her daughters’ side. She was separated from them when they were just six months old. Now eight years old, she has not seen them since. Delmy wants to have all of her children together and to build a house where she can live with them.

loans.use: to buy bricks, sand, cement and iron, and to pay labourers to carry out repairs to her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, oil, cottage cheese, pork rind and beans to prepare and sell stuffed tortillas.

loans.name: Ismael

texts.es:
Ismael, de 32 años de edad, estudió hasta tercer año de bachillerato, está casado, su esposa se dedica a los oficios del hogar, es padre de una niña de 9 años de edad, que estudia cuarto grado en la escuela del cantón, vive con su esposa y su hija.

Ismael, se dedica al trabajo de mecánica industrial, este trabajo lo aprendió en una empresa privada, se dedica a este oficio desde hace unos 15 años, su trabajo está ubicado a una distancia de 3 kilómetros de su casa, se transporta en bicicleta y su horario de trabajo es de 5:00 a.m a 5:00 p.m.
 
Ismael, esta solicitando el crédito en CREDICAMPO para comprar ganado de repasto, el tiene una parcela en donde puede mantener el ganado, el piensa que en un determinado tiempo, puede tener ganancia económica.

Ismael, sueña con tener un buen futuro con su familia y poder darle la oportunidad a su hija para que estudie en la universidad, de esta forma estaría dejando un buen legado a su hija.
texts.en:
Ismael is 32 years old and studied up to third year of high school. He is married; his wife looks after the household chores. Ismael is father to a nine-year-old girl who is in fourth grade at the local school. Ismael lives with his wife and daughter.

Ismael is an industrial mechanic, a trade he learned with a private enterprise. He has been doing this work for 15 years. The job is some three kilometres from his house and he arrives there by bicycle. Ismael works from 5am until 5pm.

Ismael is applying for a loan from CrediCampo in order to buy grazing cattle. He has a plot of land where he can look after them and is thinking that, within time, he can earn a profit from the cattle.

Ismael dreams of having a good future with his family and of being able to give his daughter the opportunity to study at university. This way, he can leave his daughter a good legacy.

loans.use: to buy grazing cattle.

loans.name: Kendi Cristabel

texts.es:
Kendi, de 27 años de edad, es empleada y estudió hasta tercer año de bachillerato, es madre soltera de un niño de 7 años de edad, actualmente vive con su hijo, su madre, su hermano y su padrastr.

Kendi, trabaja como impulsadora desde hace 2 años, para llegar a su lugar de trabajo, tiene que viajar en bus 7 kilómetros todos los días, su horario de trabajo es de 7:00 a.m a 5:00 p.m.

Ella, solicita el préstamo para comprar cemento, lamina y tuvos para poder ampliar un poco el patio de su casa, ya que está muy reducido.

El sueño de Kendi, es llegar a trabajar como ejecutiva de ventas, para poder obtener un poco más de ingresos y así darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Kendi is 27 years old. She studied up to third year at high school and now has a job. She is a single mother to one seven-year-old boy. She currently lives with her son, her mother, her brother and her step-father.

Kendi has been working as a saleswoman for two years. She has to travel seven kilometres by bus in order to arrive at work. She works from 7am until 5pm.

Kendi is applying for this loan in order to buy cement, metal sheeting and pipes in order to extend the currently very small patio of her home a little.

Kendi’s dream is to become a sales executive in order to earn a little more money and give her family a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cement, metal sheeting and pipes in order to extend the patio of her home a little.

loans.name: Blanca Elizabeth

texts.es:
Blanca de 44 años de edad, estudió hasta séptimo grado de básica en la escuela y se dedicó a ayudarle a su madre con los oficio del hogar, está acompañada y su esposo trabaja de albañil, tiene tres  hijas de las edades de 18, 16 y 5 años, y se encuentran estudiando en la estudian en la escuela, por lo tanto son las únicas que dependen de ella.

Blanca se dedica  a los oficios domésticos desde que era pequeña debido a que su madre también se dedicaba a esta actividad, ella le ayudaba y fue así como aprendió, sus hijas más grandes cuando tienen tiempos libres le ayudan en algunos quehaceres, ella no tiene horario de trabajo debido a que se levanta temprano para poder atender a su familia, a sus hijos para que se vayan a la escuela y a su esposo para que se vaya a su trabajo.

Ella solicita este crédito para comprar 15 pliegos de lámina, 5 cuartones de madera, y pagar mano de obra para remodelar su cocina, gracias a esta construcción tendrá  más espacio y más orden en la cocina.                     

Ella sueña con apoyar a sus hijas para que terminen sus estudios y puedan superarse con una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
44 year-old Blanca studied until 7th grade in school and works helping her mother with organising the household. She is accompanied by her husband who works as a builder; she has three daughters, aged 18, 16 and 5 years old, and they are studying at school. They are the only family members to depend on her.

Blanca has been making a living organising the household since she was little, given that her mother also made a living doing the same thing; her mother helped her, and this is how she learned. When her daughters have free time, they help her with certain chores. She doesn't have a schedule because she wakes up early to take care of her family and her children so that they go to school, and her husband so that he goes to work.

She needs this loan to buy 15 sheets of metal, 5 planks of wood, and to pay for the labour costs of remodelling her kitchen; thanks to this building work she will have more space and more order in the kitchen.

She dreams of supporting her daughters so that they might finish their studies and excel in life with a university degree.

loans.use: to buy 15 sheets of metal, 5 planks of wood, and to buy for the labour costs of remodelling her kitchen

loans.name: Rosel

texts.en:
Rosel is 32 years old and lives with her family at Solana. She is a vendor while her husband is a farmer. She wants to increase her income but she needs additional capital of PHP 3,000 to buy more vegetables to sell. With her loan, she will buy onions, cabbages, tomatoes and eggplant to sell. 

Someday, with good flow of income in her business, she will be able to save funds for her family's future expenses.

loans.use: to buy onions, cabbages, tomatoes and eggplant to sell

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is 48 years old and married with four children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs an ambulant business vending household goods in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional household goods to sell.

Wilma has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the ambulant vending business for 15 years and also earns an income from raising pigs.

Wilma aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional household goods to sell

loans.name: Joel

texts.en:
Joel is a hardworking man living in Masindi, Uganda. He has a retail shop that sells general merchandise such as sugar and soap in a retail shop. He earns a salary to boost his income generation. He wishes to educate his children; however, he is challenged by inadequate capital.

Joel will use the loan to buy general merchandise such as sugar and soap to sell.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise such as sugar and soap to sell.

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida is 59 years old and married with four children. She works very hard to provide for her family.

Nida runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, noodles, canned goods, spices, etc.

Nida has been in this business for 30 years.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, noodles, canned goods, and spices

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Husam

texts.en:
Husam is a 23-year-old single man from Tubas, a village near Nablus city. He opened a store for selling cosmetics and gifts in his village. It is a very good business and the demand is high. Husam always thinks about how to improve his business and expand it.

Husam took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new collection of makeup and women's bags for his cosmetics store. By taking this loan, Husam will be able to increase his sales and improve his living conditions.

Husam appears in the photo in his store.

loans.use: to buy a new collection of makeup and women's bags for his cosmetics store.

loans.name: Javier Orlando

texts.es:
Javier Orlando tiene 47 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge y sus tres hijos en la provincia de Callayuc, ubicada en la región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Las actividades que se desarrollan en este distrito son la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos, cuenta con más de 05 años de experiencia en este negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. El presente crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de cerdos, así como para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento del lugar donde los cría. Con esto Javier Orlando espera ofrecer un producto de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Javier Orlando is 47 years old, and is in a common-law marriage. He lives with his partner and three children in the Callayuc province, which is located in Cajamarca region in the Northern Sierra of Peru. The main trades in this area are agriculture, breeding and commerce. 

He makes a living breeding and selling pigs; he has over 5 years' experience in this business with steady customers who provide very good personal and professional references for him. The current loan will be used to buy more pigs, as well as to carry out some repairs and upkeep the place where he breeds them. Javier Orlando thus hopes to offer a higher quality product to his customers, which will have a positive impact on his level of income, and will ultimately improve his quality of life, and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of pigs and carry out some repairs and maintenance on the place where he breeds them.

loans.name: Rebeca Trinidad

texts.es:
Rebeca tiene 32 años de edad vive con sus padres y su hijo de 3 años en Guaranda, provincia de Bolivar,
Ella tiene un restaurant y solicita el credito para la compra de un televisor para poner en el local para dar una mejor imagen y poder darles una mejor atencion a los clientes. Realizara la compra el guaranda en Almacenes La ganga, Su sueño es tener un trabajo estable, los desafios a los que se enfrenta es ejercer su profesion ya que estudio pero no hay trabajo para formarce como profesional, en su tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Rebeca, 32, lives with her parents and three-year-old son in Guaranda, in the province of Bolivar.  She has a restaurant and is requesting a loan to buy a TV for the business to make it more attractive and to provide better customer service.

She will make the purchase in Guaranda in Almacenes La Ganga.  Her dream is to have a stable job.  The challenge she faces is being able to work in her profession since she has an education but there is no employment available.  In her free time she enjoys sports.

loans.use: To buy a TV.

loans.name: Eleodoro

texts.es:
Eleodoro tiene 43 años de edad, vive en casa propia junto a sus hijos y esposa en el distrito de Pucará, una comunidad que se caracteriza por su clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicado en la ciudad de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de labores agrícolas de arado, actividad que consiste en unir a dos toros del mismo tamaño y colocar en el centro una herramienta que sirve para remover la tierra para prepararlo para los cultivos, también trabaja en siembra, cosecha y desyerbos de terrenos arroceros. Ha solicitado un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de toretes para seguir brindando el servicio de arado y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia, con esto Eleodoro espera mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Eleodoro is 43 years old; he lives in his own house along with his children and his wife in the Pucará district, a community known for its hot climate, and whose population works in agriculture, commerce and breeding; it is located in the city of Jaén, in the Cajamarca region in the Northern Sierra of Peru.

He makes a living offering ploughing services, which consists of joining two bulls of the same size and putting them in the middle of a contraption which turns the soil to prepare it for planting. He also works in sewing, harvesting and de-weeding rice fields. He has asked for a loan to invest in the purchase of young beef bulls to continue to provide a ploughing service, which would allow him to generate greater income for his family. Eleodoro hopes that this will improve the quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of young beef bulls, to continue providing a ploughing service.

loans.name: Lolis

texts.es:
Lolis tiene 23 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijo en el distrito de Colasay, una comunidad de bosques verdes, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente al cultivo de café, desde hace 6 años, su esposo le apoya en esta labor, son una familia unida. Cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de abonos y fertilizantes para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de café y de esta manera tener una producción oportuna para ofrecer a sus clientes, con esto Lolis espera ofrecer un café de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que le va a generar mayores niveles de ingreso y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Lolis is 23 years old, and lives with her husband and son in the Colasay district, a community of green woods, whose population work in agriculture, commerce and breeding; it is located in the Jaén Province, in the Cajamarca region of the Northern Sierra of Peru.

She makes a living in agriculture, especially growing coffee, which she has been doing for the last 6 years. Her husband helps her in her work, and they are a united family. She has experience in business, and very good personal and professional references in the area. She has asked for a loan to buy manure and fertilisers for the upkeep of her coffee plantation, which is a way for her to have an appropriate amount of produce to offer her customers. Lolis hopes that this will offer her customers a better quality coffee, which will generate more income and ultimately improve the quality of life for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilisers for the upkeep of her coffee plantation.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es:
Teresa, vive felizmente con su esposo, no tienen hijos que dependan de ellos, su fuente de ingreso es la venta de cosméticos, ropa y productos de nutrición natural, hizo su apertura hace 30 años y con las ganancias ha ido diversificando los productos que oferta a sus clientes, trabaja de lunes a domingo, hasta la fecha no representa dificultades en su negocio ni de salud.
Utilizará el crédito para comprar vestidos, camisas, faldas, pantalones, ropa interior, etc., para ambos sexos, también surtirá la venta de productos de nutrición natural, la inversión será de ayuda para que su negocio tenga mercadería disponible con la que cubra las necesidades de sus clientes, espera mejorar su situación financiera. 
Su visión con el negocio es  lograr tener mejor rentabilidad que le permita cubrir todos sus gastos familiares y cancelar sus deudas.
texts.en:
Teresa lives happily with her husband and they have no dependent children. Her source of income is the sales of cosmetics, clothes and natural nutrition products. She opened her business 30 years ago and with the profits she has progressively diversified the products that she offers to her clients. She works from Monday to Sunday and up until now she has had no difficulties with her business or her health. 

She will use the loan to buy dresses, shirts, skirts, trousers, underwear etc. for both sexes, as well as to stock the shop with natural nutrition products. The investment will help her business have merchandise available to cover her clients' needs and she hopes to improve her financial situation. Her vision for her business is to improve profitability that will allow her to cover her family expenses and pay off her debts.

loans.use: to buy dresses, shirts, skirts, trousers, underwear, etc. for both sexes, also to stock the shop with natural nutrition products

loans.name: Paula Soledad

texts.es: Paula esta casada y tiene 27 años edad, tiene 2 hijos de 3 y 4 años, el mayor ya esta estudiando, el esposo de Paula se dedica  a trabajar  a la agricultura, Paula se dedica a la crianza de animales menores y a trabajar al jornal, con  el dinero del crédito va  a comprar terneros que los va  a tener hasta que crezcan y los pueda comercializar, la aspiración de Paula es de trabajar duro y lograr la compra de una casa que está en trámite de compra.
texts.en: Paula is married and is 27 years old. She has 2 children, aged 3 and 4 years old; the eldest is already at school, and Paula's husband works in agriculture. Paula makes a living breeding small animals works on a daily wage. With the money from the loan, she will buy calves that she will keep until they grow and can be sold. Paula aspires to working hard and her goal is to get the house she is in the process of buying.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Luis Eduardo

texts.es: Eduardo se dedica a la agricultura, tiene 36 años de edad y tiene 2 hijos de 8 y 10 años y asisten a la agricultura, Eduardo vive en una casa que le presta un familiar, Eduardo se dedica al jornal de trabajo de agricultura y también se dedica  al crianza y comercio de ganado para obtener sus ingresos, con el dinero del crédito Eduardo va a comprar terneros, la aspiración de Eduardo es de mejorar su negocio lograr mejores ingresos y que sus hijos terminen sus estudios.
texts.en:
Eduardo makes a living farming; he is 36 years old and he has 2 children, aged 8 and 10, who help him with farming. Eduardo lives in a house which a family member is lending him. Eduardo makes a living on a daily wage by farming, and he also breeds and sells livestock to generate income.

Eduardo will use the money from the loan to buy calves. He aspires to improving his business in order to generate more income, so that his children might finish their studies.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan, de 22 años de edad, está casado, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domesticos y cuidar a su hijo de 3 meses de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, ya que sus padres no contaban con los suficientes recursos economicos para mandarlo a la universidad, el hubiese querido estudiar, pero sus sueños no se pudieron hacer realidad.

Por lo tanto decidio dedicarse a trabajar en la agricultura, tiene 10 años de experiencia de trabajar con su padre sembrando maíz y frijol. 

Juan, siembra en la tierra que sus padres le dieron, pero para que el pueda construir su vivienda el lugar donde el cultiva, el terreno está cerca de su casa y se va caminando. 

El está solicitando un crédito para iniciar a construir su casita, ya cuenta con algunos materiales pero necesita comprar lo demás y para pagarle al que ayudará en la construccion. 

El sueña con poder encontrar un empleo fijo, para poder sostener a su familia.
texts.en:
Juan, 22, is married and his wife takes care of the household and their three-month-old baby boy.  Juan has a high school education but his parents could not afford for him to go to the university.  He would have liked to continue his education but was unable to do so.

Therefore he decided to work in agriculture and now has ten years' experience working with his father growing corn and beans.  He works on the land his parents gave him where he wants to build a house.  Now he walks there to work, as it is nearby.

The loan he is requesting is to start building his house.  He already has some of the materials but needs to buy more and hire someone to help with construction.

His dream is to find steady employment to support his family.

loans.use: To start building his house.

loans.name: Francisca Edith

texts.es:
Francisca de 55 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado, está casada y su esposo es agricultor y junto con ella vive su madre.

Francisca trabaja en una finca cafetalera desde hace seis años, se dedica este oficio puesto que ella necesita una fuente de ingresos para ayudarle a su esposo en los gastos del hogar, aparte de eso ella se dedica a los oficios del hogar en las tardes cuando llega de trabajar. El trabajo lo tiene a media hora de su casa y en un horario de 8:00am a 4:00pm.

Francisca ocupará el financiamiento para comprar alambre de púa, postes de madera y grampas para montar un cerco.

Ella espera sacar un crédito mas adelante para mejorar su casa.
texts.en:
Francisca, 55, has a sixth grade education.  She is married and her husband works in agriculture.  Her mother lives with them.

Francisca works on a coffee plantation where she has been for six years.  She does this to earn an income to help her husband with the household expenses.  She also does the housework in the afternoons when she gets home from work.  Her work schedule is from 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. and the job is half an hour away from home.

Francisca will use the loan to buy barbed wire, wood posts and staples to put up a fence.  She wants to request another loan in the future to renovate her house.

loans.use: To buy barbed wire, wood posts and staples to put up a fence.

loans.name: Adela

texts.es:
Adela, de 58 años de edad, es ama de casa y no estudio debido a la situación económica de sus padres, pues eran muy pobres y lo que ganaban solo les alcanzaba para la alimentación diaria, está casada y junto a su esposo tiene 5 hijos de 37, 35, 33, 30, y 25 años de edad, 3 de ellos ya están casados y trabajan para sus hogares y 2 aún viven con ella; su esposo se dedica a la ganadería y a la agricultura.

Ella, se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras desde hace 10 años, trabajo que lo aprendió de sus amigas que se dedican a este negocio, para llegar a su trabajo Adela, camina 100 metros y su horario de 5:00 a.m a 3:00 p.m todos los días.

En el invierno se dedica a la siembra de hortalizas, siembra pepino, pipianes y ejotes.

El crédito que está solicitando en la institución es para comprar 4 novillas, para vender la leche, con ello podrá obtener un poco más de ingresos, para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.

El sueño de Adela, es construir una vivienda de ladrillo ya que en la que vive es de barro y está en malas condiciones.
texts.en:
Adela, 58, is a homemaker and was unable to get an education because her parents could not afford it.  They were poor and used what they earned to feed the family on a daily basis.  Adela is married and has five children, ages 37, 35, 33, 30 and 25.  Three of them are married and independent, and two still live at home.  Her husband works in livestock farming and agriculture.

She sells fruit and vegetables and has been in business for ten years.  She learned about it from her friends who are in the same business.  Adela walks 100 meters to work and her schedule is 5:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m., every day.  In the winter she grows vegetables: cucumber, squash and green beans.

The loan she is requesting through the institution is to buy four calves to sell milk.  This will allow her to earn a little more income so her family can enjoy a better quality of life.

Adela's dream is to build a brick house since the one she lives in is made of adobe and is in poor condition.

loans.use: To buy four calves.

loans.name: Cfjdt 6 Group

texts.fr: CFJDT 6 fait parti des sous groupes de la Convention des Femmes et Jeunes pour le Développement de Tassette. Ils habitent tous dans le même village et pratiquent les mêmes activités. Ils se regroupent tous les fins de mois pour organiser des cotisations mensuelles. Le président s'appelle Monsieur Toumane, c'est lui qui a levé la main sur la photo. Il évolue dans l'agriculture du mil, niébé (haricot), arachide etc.... Il a une expérience de plus de 10 ans. Il demande ce crédit pour acheter des semences et des intrants. Il gère les charges familiales et les frais de scolarité de ses enfants. A l'avenir il souhaite aller en Europe pour acheter des pièces détachées et venir les revendre. Ainsi il pourra augmenter ses revenus et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
CFJDT 6 is one of the sub-groups of the "Convention des Femmes et Jeunes pour le Développement de Tassette" (the convention of women and young people for the development of the rural community of Tassette). They all live in the same village and have the same type of business activities. They get together at the end of each month to organise the monthly contributions.

The group leader is called Toumane (he is the one with his hand raised in the picture). He grows produce like millet, niébé (beans) and groundnuts. He has over 10 years experience. He is requesting this loan in order to buy seeds and agricultural inputs. He takes care of the family expenses and his children's education costs. In the future, he would like to go to Europe to buy spare parts and resell them at home. This would allow him to increase his income and to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy seeds and agricultural inputs.

loans.name: Nubia Melvis

texts.es:
Nubia de 39 años de edad, estudió hasta tercer año de bachillerato, es madre soltera de tres hijos de los cuales solo uno estudia y los otros aún están bien pequeños, en su casa solo vive con sus tres hijos y su madre, todos dependen ella.

Nubia es comerciante, desde hace 16 años se dedica a este negocio, ya que era su mejor opción para generar  ingresos, aparte de eso se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, su madre es la única que se involucra en sus negocios, Nubia sale a diferentes lugares a vender pero además tiene un puesto fijo por lo cual trabaja durante todo el día.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar una docena de camisas femeninas, media docena de sostenes y ropa interior. Su satisfacción será que podrá ofrecer variedad a sus clientes pues tendrá mercadería disponible.

Ella sueña con que sus hijos sean profesionales ya que ella no tuvo la oportunidad de hacerlo.
texts.en:
Nubia, 39, reached her third year of high school.  She is a single mother and has three children.  Only one of them attends school because the other two are too young.  Her three children and mother all depend on her.

Nubia is a merchant and has been involved in her business for 16 years, since it was the best way to earn an income.  She also does the housework.  Her mother is the only one who helps with the business.  Nubia goes out to different places to sell her goods and she also has a shop where she works all day.

The loan she needs is to buy a dozen women's blouses, half a dozen bras and lingerie.  She will be happy to offer her customers a variety of new merchandise.

Her dream is to see her children become professionals because she did not have the opportunity to do so.

loans.use: To buy a dozen women's blouses, half a dozen bras and lingerie.

loans.name: Cruz

texts.es:
Cruz es una persona muy amable, él tiene 59 años, viven junto a su hermosa familia en una comunidad de Sololá.
Cruz para generar sus ingresos económicos, se dedica a la agricultura el siembra papa y zanahoria, esta actividad lo realiza en la  misma comunidad donde vive, Cruz por ser una persona responsable ha logrado prosperidad en la vida. Para Cruz la agricultura es buena ya que genera ganancias, pero esto no es  suficiente para volver a sembrar, es por eso que él está buscando un prestamo de dos mil seiscientos quetzales que lo estaría invirtiendo en la compra de semillas y fertilizantes.

Cruz a parte de la agricultura, él también trabaja como ayudante de albañil,  para Cruz contar con un  solo ingreso es difícil mantener a la familia, porque a los hijos se les debe dar lo necesario, la meta de Cruz es conseguir el prestamo para poder implementar nuevamente su siembra. 
Los sueños de Cruz es generar más ingresos cada día para poder mantener la educación de sus hijos y verlos algún día llegar hacer profesionales, para que ellos tengan una mejor  calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Cruz is a very kind person. He is 59 years old and lives with his beautiful family in a community in Sololá.
To earn an income, Cruz sows potato and carrot seeds. He does this in the same community in which he lives. As he is a responsible person he has managed to prosper in life. Cruz thinks that farming is good as it generates income, however it does not generate enough to sow more seeds, so he is asking for this loan of 2600 quetzals to invest in seeds and fertiliser.

As well as farming, Cruz also works as an assistant construction worker. He feels that with just one income it is difficult to look after his family, as he owes his children the necessities. Cruz aims to get this loan to be able to sow seeds again.
His dream is to generate a higher income everyday so as to pay for the education of his children and see them become professionals one day so that they can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertiliser for farming.

loans.name: Juan De Dios

texts.es:
Juan de 52 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, él no sabe leer ni escribir pues sus padres no lo mandaron a la escuela debido a que eran  tiempos muy difíciles económicamente, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene seis hijos de los cuales cuatro ya son mayores de edad y  tienen su propio hogar, solamente los dos hijos menores  están en su casa  los cuales estudian, ellos y su esposa dependen de Juan.

Juan se dedica a la agricultura, desde que era pequeño le ayudaba a su padre con los trabajos de siembra de maíz, frijoles, tomates, pepinos, pipianes, chiles, además tiene un mariposario, desde que era pequeño observaba como su abuelo cuidaba las mariposas, entonces le ayudaba y fue así como aprendió, no tiene un horario específico de trabajo pues todo el día se mantiene ocupado.

Juan necesita el crédito para comprar un rollo de alambre para proteger sus cultivos, también abono y fertilizantes.

Don Juan planea para un futuro mejorar su mariposario, ampliarlo más para así  poder reproducir más mariposas, además desea mejorar su casa, remodelarla y también ayudar a sus hijos a que estudien, que puedan tener una buena educación y  una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
52 year-old Juan didn't have the chance to study; he cannot read or write, as his parents didn't send him to school because they were facing tough economic times. He is accompanied by his partner, and he makes a living carrying out home repairs. He has 6 children, four of whom are already of adult age and have their own homes. Only two of the children are still at home and study; they and his wife are dependent on Juan.

Juan has been making a living in farming since he was small, and he would help his father with planting corn, beans, tomatoes, cucumbers, thick and standard chilli peppers. He also has a butterfly farm, because when he was little he used to watch how his grandfather took care of butterflies, and he would help him; this is how he learned. He doesn't have a set work schedule because he is busy all day.

Juan needs the loan to buy a roll of wire to protect his crops, and to buy manure and fertilisers. 

Don Juan plans on improving his butterfly farm in the future, expanding it more in order to breed butterflies. He also wishes to improve his house, remodel it and help his children study, so that they might receive a good education and go to university.

loans.use: to buy a roll of wire to protect his crops, and to buy manure and fertilisers.

loans.name: Cfjdt 5 Group

texts.fr: CFJDT est un sous groupe de la Convention des Femmes et des Jeunes pour le Développement de Tassettes. Ils habitent tous dans le même village et pratiquent les mêmes activités. Ils se regroupent tous les fins de mois pour l'organisation des tontines. Il est composé de 6 personnes. Le président se nomme El Hadji Oumar, c'est lui qui a levé la main sur la photo. Il évolue dans l'agriculture et la commercialisation des fruits et légumes. Il sollicite ce crédit pour acheter des semences et des intrants. Il a une expérience de plus de 10 ans et commence sa journée à 9h pour la terminer à 19h. Il est marié et père de famille qui prend en charge toutes les dépenses quotidiennes de sa famille. Il veut à l'avenir augmenter et diversifier ses produits. Ainsi, il voudrait avoir deux maisons en location.
texts.en:
CFJDT 5 is one of the sub-groups of the "Convention des Femmes et Jeunes pour le Développement de Tassette" (the convention of women and young people for the development of the rural community of Tassette). They all live in the same village and have the same type of business activities. They get together at the end of each month to organise the monthly contributions. The group is made up of 6 people.

The group leader is called El Hadji Oumar (he is the one with his hand raised in the picture). He is a farmer and sells fruit and vegetables. He is requesting this loan in order to buy seeds and agricultural inputs. He has over 10 years experience and his workday starts at 9 am and ends at 7 pm. He is married and a father and covers all of his family's daily expenses. In the future, he would like to diversify his business and own two rental properties.

loans.use: to buy seeds and agricultural inputs.

loans.name: Pothe's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe constitué de quatre femmes a été crée depuis le cycle premier du banc villageois. Il regroupe des femmes unies par de bonnes relations sociales et professionnelles.
La responsable madame Pothe est une femme mariée âgée de 36 ans et mère de cinq enfants dont trois garçons et deux filles tous scolarisés.
Elle s'active dans le commerce par la vente de de produits divers composés de bijoux et d'habits .
Avec son nouveau crédit de 300 000 francs CFA elle va se payer 18 habits prêt à porter à 5500 l'un et 28 paire de bijoux à 2500 la paire qu'elle va revendre au niveau de son quartier.
Les bénéfices réalisés lui permettent de renforcer ses épargnes et aide son mari dans la prise en charge de besoins familiaux.
texts.en: This group is made up of 4 women and was created during the first cycle of the "banc villageois". It groups together women with good social and business relationships. The group leader, Pothe, is married, 36 years old and the mother of 5 children (3 boys and 2 girls) who all attend school. Pothe runs a business selling various products like jewellery and clothing. Her new loan of 300 000 francs will enable her to buy 18 items of ready-to-wear clothing (at 5 500 francs a piece) and 28 sets of jewellery (at 2 500 francs per set) which she will resell in her district. The profits she makes will enable her to strengthen her savings and to help her husband take care of the family's needs.

loans.use: to buy jewellery and clothing.

loans.name: Ana Yanci

texts.es:
Ana, se dedica a vender prendas de vestir para ambos sexos tanto para niños/as y adultos, para tener ingresos extras Ana incluye la venta de otros productos que sean alusivos a una determinada época del año como por ejemplo: inicio de años escolar, el mes del amor y la amistad, día de la madre, etc., vive en casa familiar con sus 3 hijos, solo 2 son dependientes de ella.
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar camisas, blusas, toallas, chores, calcetines, pantalones y chancletas, mejorara su inventario para mantener su negocio actualizado con las modas, con ello espera atraer nuevos clientes, incrementar sus ventas y ganancias para tener recursos económicos con los que cubrirá las necesidades básicas de su familia y cancelara su deuda.
Sus aspiraciones son continuar trabajando y administrar muy bien el crédito para tener una máxima utilidad.
texts.en:
Ana sells clothing for both sexes, boys and girls and adults. To earn extra income, Ana also sells other products relevant for particular times of year, such as: the start of the school year, Valentine's Day and the month of love and friendship, Mother's Day etc. 

She lives in a family home with her three children, only two of whom are dependent on her. She will use the loan to buy shirts, blouses, towels, shorts, socks, trousers and flip-flops, which will improve her stock to keep her business up to date with fashion. With this, she hopes to attract new customers and to increase her sales and profits to have the financial means to cover her family's basic needs and pay off her debt. 

Her ambitions are to continue working and to manage the loan well for maximum return.

loans.use: to buy shirts, blouses, towels, shorts, socks, trousers and flip-flops, which will improve her stock to keep her business up to date with fashion

loans.name: Edwin Ivan

texts.es:
Edwin, de 27 años de edad, estudio hasta primer año de bachillerato, no pudo seguir estudiando por la situación económica, esta acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios de la casa, es padre de tres hijos, de estos solo uno estudia.

Edwin, se dedica a la venta de pan desde hace 7 años, este trabajo lo realiza desde que dejo de estudiar; anteriormente, trabajaba en la agricultura, pero como ese trabajo no le daba buenos ingresos, decidió dedicarse al comercio de pan.- Edwin, sale a vender el pan en su bicicleta 2 veces al dia, de 5:00 a 8:30 de la mañana y en la tarde de 2:00 p.m a 6:00 p.m.

Edwin, esta solicitando el crédito para la compra de una motocicleta, esto ayudará a que pueda vender en otros cantones aledaños y tendrá mejores ganancias. 

El sueño de Edwin, es tener 10 vacas lecheras, para poder tener leche para su familia, tener una panadería propia y tener una casa propia, ya que que por el momento reside es casa de su familia.
texts.en:
Edwin is 27 years old. He studied up until the first year of college however he could not continue his studies due to his financial situation. He has a partner who does the housework. He has three children of which only one studies.

Edwin has been earning a living selling bread. He has been doing this since he stopped studying, before that he worked in farming however as this job did not earn him a good income he decided to start selling bread. Edwin goes out to sell bread on his bicycle twice a day. From 5am-8.30 am and then from 2pm-6pm.

He is asking for this loan to buy a motorcycle as this will help him to be able to sell in other neighbouring villages and to earn a better income.

His dreams are to have ten dairy cows so he can have milk for his family, to have his own bakery and to have his own house, as he is currently staying in his family's house.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Irma Elena

texts.es:
Irma, vende camarones, pescado y moluscos, está actividad tiene 12 años de desempeñarla, con su experiencia ha mantenido todo este tiempo su fuente de ingresos funcionando, de esta manera apoya a su esposo con los gastos familiares, ella es casada, vive con su esposo y sus hijos, los cuales son dependientes.
Invertirá en camarones, moluscos y pescado, la compra le permitirá seguir vendiendo sus productos e ir preparando el pescado para  venderlo seco en la época de Semana Santa, espera que las demandas aumenten y que las pueda cubrir para tener mejores ingresos.
Sus sueños son tener mejores utilidades con las que fácilmente cancelara su deuda y ofrecerá una mejor alimentación, vestuario y salud a su familia.
texts.en:
Irma sells shrimps, fish and molluscs; she has been doing this for the last 12 years, and with her experience she has kept her source of income steady, which is how she has been able to support her husband with the household expenses. She is married, lives with her husband and their children, who are dependent on their parents.

She will buy shrimps, fish and molluscs, which will allow her  to keep selling her products aand prepare fish to sell it dry during Holy Week. She hopes that demand increases and that she can supply for them in order to receive better income.

Her dreams are to have better utilities with which she might easily cancel her debt, and to offer better nourishment, clothing and health to her family.

loans.use: buy shrimps, molluscs and fish; this purchase will allow her to keep selling her products aand prepare fish to sell it dry during Holy Week.

loans.name: José Lucas

texts.es:
José es un señor que estudió hasta segundo grado, la situacion económica lo obligó a salirse de estudiar para dedicarse a trabajar. Está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domesticos, son padres de tres hijos y todos ya tienen su propio hogar, por lo tanto solo su esposa depende de José

José es hilador y agricultor, él tiene mas de treinta años dedicándose a este oficio, lo aprendió de su padre pues esa fue la fuente de ingresos de su familia y él decidio dedicarse a este oficio tambien ya que sabe todo sobre la elaboracion de lazos, hamacas, matates y columpios. Aparte de eso se dedica a la agricultura, él siembra granos básicos como frijol, maiz y maicillo los cuales son para el consumo de la familia, a José siempre le ayuda su esposa en las tardes cuando ya ha finalizado las labores del hogar.

Él solicita este préstamo a CrediCampo para comprar 5 bollos de fibra y 7 de mezcal para la elaboracion de lazos, columpios y matates, también para pagar mano de obra.

Su sueño es ampliar su negocio y darle la atencion y el servicio a todas las personas que se lo solicitan ya que por falta de tiempo y mano de obra no puede brindarlo.
texts.en:
José is a man who studied until second grade; his family's economic situation forced him to quit his studies to make a living. He is married and his wife makes a living in household work. They are parents to three children, who all already have their own home, which means that only José's wife depends on him. 

José is a spinner and farmer; he has more than thirty years' experience working in this field, and he learned teh trade from his father as this was the family's source of income. He decided to go into this trade too, as he knew everything about making bows, hammocks, canvas bags and swings. Aside from that he works in farming: he plants basic grains such as beans, corn and sorghum, which are for his family's consumption. José's wife always helps him in the afternoons when she has finished the household chores.

He is asking CrediCampo for this loan to buy 5 balls of fibre and 7 of thread to make bows, swings and canvas bags, and also to pay the workers. 

His dream is to expand his business and provide a service for all those who ask for it, because as a result of the lack of workers he has not been able to provide this.

loans.use: to buy 5 balls of fibre and 7 of thread to make bows, swings and canvas bags, as well as to pay the workers.

loans.name: Bayarbat

texts.en:
Bayarbat, 28 years old, lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He and his wife have been selling furniture since 2008. He is responsible for buying good furniture from China retailers and households. His wife sells this furniture to local people at reasonable price.

Using his previous loan, he has bought furniture and generated a good amount of revenue. Now he is requesting a loan of 2,500,000 MNT to buy furniture such as sofas, drawers, and closets from Korea at cheaper price than that of China. As a result, he can generate more income for his family and provide customers with quality Korean furniture.
