RIGO, TRABAJA CON GANADO DE REPASTO, LO HA HECHO POR MÁS DE OCHO AÑOS Y LO APRENDIO DE SU ESPOSA, FUE POR ESA RAZÓN QUE DECIDIO HACERLO PARA BUSCAR INGRESOS ECONOMICOS EXTRAS.- TAMBIEN, TRABAJA EN MANTENIMIENTO DE AIRES ACONDICIONADOS DE FORMA INDEPENDIENTE Y LA DISTANCIA QUE CAMINA PARA LLEGAR HASTA LOS LUGARES DONDE REALIZA ESTOS TRABAJOS ESTA A 1 KM DE SU CASA, LE APOYA SU ESPOSA Y SU HORARIO ES VARIADO. 

RIGO, NESECITA EL CRÉDITO PARA COMPRAR GANADO DE REPASTO, ESTO MEJORARA MUCHO PORQUE PODRA TENER MÁS GANADO Y ESTO LE GENERARA MÁS GANANCIA Y MEJORAR SU CALIDAD DE VIDA.

SUS SUEÑOS SON SEGUIR TRABAJANDO LO MEJOR QUE SE PUEDA PARA DARLES UN MEJOR FUTURO A SU FAMILIA Y QUE SUS HIJOS SE PRERPAREN ACADEMICAMENTE.
texts.en:
Rigo has a grade 6 education. He is married, and his wife looks after their home. They have two children who attend school and who live with them.

Rigo works with cattle, a job he’s had for more than eight years and which he learned from his wife. He decided to raise cattle as he wanted to earn more money. He also works independently servicing air conditioning units. Both of his jobs are located a one-kilometre walk from his home. His wife helps him with the work. His schedule varies.

Rigo needs the loan to buy cattle. This purchase will help him a lot as he will then be able to generate more income and improve his standard of living.

His dreams are to continue working to the best of his ability so he can provide his family with a better future, and to ensure his children have a good education.

loans.use: buy cattle

loans.name: Candelaria

texts.es:
Candelaria, de 46 años de edad, es ama de casa y estudio hasta segundo grado, no continuo estudiando porque sus padres no le dieron la oportunidad, está casada y es madre de 4 hijos de 27, 22, 19 y 16 años de edad, 2 de ellos ya están casados y trabajan para sus propios hogares, en casa vive solo con 2 hijos y su esposo, el cual se dedica a la agricultura.

Candelaria, trabaja en la agricultura desde hace 25 años y lo aprendió de sus padres, quienes toda la vida se han dedicado a este oficio, también tiene una pequeña crianza de animales.- Para trasladarse a su trabajo, ella camina un kilómetro y su horario de trabajo es de 6:00 a.m a 12:00 del mediodía.

El préstamo que está solicitando en la institución, es para comprar 5 novillas de repasto, con esto ella logrará tener un poco más de ingresos, para darle a su familia todo lo que necesiten.

El sueño de Candelaria, es tener un negocio de venta de zapatos y ropa.- Además, desea ampliar su vivienda ya que en la que residen actualmente, es un poco pequeña, otro de sus sueños es que su hijo siga estudiando y logre graduarse de una carrera universitaria, para que tenga mejores posibilidades de trabajo.
texts.en:
Candelaria is a 46 years old housewife who studied until the second grade. She did not continue in school because her parents did not give her the opportunity. She is married and has 4 children who are 27, 22, 19 and 16 years old. Two of them are married and work to support their own families. She lives with 2 of her children and her husband who works in agriculture.

Candelaria has been working in agriculture for 25 years, she learned from her parents who have worked in this trade all of their lives.  She also works raising a few animals. She walks one kilometer to get to work and her schedule is from 6:00 am to 12 noon.

The loan she is requesting from the institution is to buy 5 grazing heifers to have more income and provide her family with all they need.

Candelaria’s dream is to have a shoe and clothing store. She also wants to expand her house because where they live now is a little small. Another of her dreams is for her son to continue in school and graduate with a university career so that he can have better job opportunities.

loans.use: to buy 5 grazing heifers.

loans.name: Valentin

texts.es:
Valentín tiene 57 años de edad, estudió hasta segundo grado, ya que sus padres prefirieron que trabajara a que estudiara debido a que proviene de una familia de escasos recursos económicos, él está casado, su esposa se dedica a ayudar a  una hija en un negocio de tortillas, con Valentín vive una hija y varios nietos pero solo su esposa depende de él.

Él se dedica a la agricultura, siembra maíz y frijol, además cuida ganado, estos trabajos los aprendió de sus padres  pues desde pequeño le enseñaron a cultivar y a criar animales para cubrir las necesidades del hogar.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar tusa y zacate para alimentar a sus animales pues en periodo de verano los pastos se terminan y con la tusa y el zacate  que compra los mantiene alimentados.

sus sueños a futuro son comprar más animales de raza pura y poder mejorar los pastos para poder sacar leche y comercializarla para mejorar los ingresos de él y de su familia, esto lo logrará a través de la ayuda que le brinda CrediCampo a través de los créditos.
texts.en:
Valentín is 57 years old. He studied until the second year of his basic education, as his parents preferred that he work rather than study since he comes from a family of scarce economic resources. He is married and his wife works helping a daughter in the business of tortilla-making. Valentín has one daughter and many grandchildren living with him, but only his wife depends on him financially. 

He makes a living in agriculture. He grows corn and beans as well as cares for livestock. He learned this work from his parents, since from a young age they taught him to grow and raise animals to cover necessities in the home. 

He needs the loan to buy corn and hay to feed his animals since in the summer the pasture period ends and he keeps his animals fed by buying corn and hay.

His dream is to buy more purebred animals and to be able to better his pasture in order to produce milk and sell it to increase his earnings for him and his family. He will achieve this with the help of CrediCampo through loans.

loans.use: to buy corn and hay to feed his animals

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction supplies and build a small store in the yard of his house.

loans.name: Besnik

texts.en:
Besnik is a married father of three children ranging in age from 7 to 9. The oldest of them, who is in the photograph, has been scheduled for an eye surgery since he suffers from Marfan syndrome. The loan that Besnik is requesting will go to cover the surgical procedure for his son.

Besnik himself suffers from the same Marfan syndrome as his son and he receives a disability pension of about $203/month. In addition to this income, he also has two goats and some grapevines, ten orchards of apples, and five quinces. In the other part of the agricultural land he owns, he plants beans, peppers and tomatoes.

loans.use: to cover his 9-year-old son's eye surgical procedure.

loans.name: Juan

texts.en: Juan is a tailor and he lives with his grandparents. He works fixing native skirts and he needs a loan to buy cloth to keep working. Juan loves his grandparents a lot and he practically takes care of them so it is important that you help him in order to improve the life quality of his family. Juan is single and he is very responsible. He hopes you can support his business.

loans.use: to buy more cloth

loans.name: Fatoumata Amadou's Group

texts.fr:
Créé depuis le 10 Décembre 2012, les femmes du B.V sont  très solidaires entre elles et ont su par le travail d’ensemble développer une solidarité et un esprit de groupe salué. Elles ont comme activité principale le  petit commerce.

Madame Fatoumata (debout à l’extrême droite), est l’emprunteuse vedette, elle est âgée de 25 ans, mariée et mère de quatre enfants dont deux garçons et deux filles. Elle a comme activité principale la vente de fruits qu’elle achète dans les marchés hebdomadaires pour les revendre à Kolda. 

Ce nouveau prêt lui permettra d’acheter des sacs d’orange à 7000f le sac qu’elle revendra à 10000f le sac.

Les bénéfices lui permettront d’aider son mari dans la gestion des taches ménagères et d’épargner.
texts.en:
This group has been created on December 10, 2012. The group members, all women, have a good rapport and  developed a strong spirit of solidarity as a team. They mainly work as vendors.

Mrs. Fatoumata (the one standing on the far right) is the star borrower. She is 25 years old, married and has four children: two boys and two girls. She mainly works as a fruit vendor, buying fruit at weekly markets in order to resell in Kolda. This new loan will allow her to buy bags of oranges at 7,000 West African francs per bag, which she will resale for 10,000 francs per bag. Her revenues will allow her to help her husband with household expenses and   grow her savings.

loans.use: to buy bags of oranges.

loans.name: Halemeh

texts.en:
Halemeh is a 35-year-old married lady from Khan Yonis city. She is a mother of five sons and two daughters. Her husband works as an employee in the public sector, where he gets a low income. 

Halemeh has a barn for raising sheep. She sells milk and meat to the local traders. Halemeh took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy more sheep for her barn. By taking this loan, Halemeh will be able to increase the barn productivity and also the family income. Halemeh appears in the photo in her barn.

loans.use: to buy more sheep for her barn

loans.name: Aun

texts.en:
Aun, 47 years old, lives in a community of Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. She is a lovely mother of four children. To make a living and support her family, she manages and operates a farming business on a small rice farmland which is located near her house. So far, she has been in this type of business for more than 30 years. On average, she is able to make an income of USD 4.00 a day.

She wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use, because there is no latrine in her house now. Therefore, she is borrowing a loan from Kiva to build a latrine. By doing this, she can help her family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. She is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: Yolanda  tiene la edad  de 54 años, está casada, vive con el esposo . Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de dos novillos para engordarlos. Ella tiene un potrero el cual quiere aprovechar para engordar estos novillos y con ello  espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Élla no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Yolanda is 54 years old, married and lives with her husband. With this loan she hopes to buy two calves for raising. She has a pasture which she would like to use to raise these calves. In this way, she hopes to obtain some profit to improve living conditions for her family and invest a bit more in cultivation and also achieve other aims. This is the first loan she receives from FUDECOSUR. She has not had any other loans previously from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided her the loan with greater ease and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy two calves

loans.name: Crisandra

texts.en:
Crisandra is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Crisandra is 36 years old and has two children who are still in school.

Crisandra has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines. Crisandra requested a PHP 18,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase materials for motorcycle maintenance.

Crisandra has been in this business for 20 years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase materials for motorcycle maintenance

loans.name: Edwin

texts.en:
Hello lenders! Meet Edwin, 30, who is based in the Litein area of Kenya. This area is the major tea growing region of the country, but it is increasingly emerging as an important dairy farming zone for the East Africa. Thousands of farmers are now finding dairy farming a good supplement, if not a substitute, for maize farming. 

This handsome father has been practicing mixed farming for the past 14 years, and his primary source of income has been milk and eggs. He passionately loves dairy farming. He enjoys feeding his cows, and milking his cow is his hobby. Waking up every morning to milk his cow is very fulfilling to him. 

The biggest challenge he faces is the lack of a proper dairy unit where his cows can feed and rest. Because of this, he has suffered losses through diseases that attack his cows due to the harsh weather conditions. If you are to reap more from cows, you must feed them properly to get high quality milk. He is requesting a loan from Juhudi Kilimo via Kiva lenders to build a modern dairy unit. With the loan, he will be able to increase his milk production, improve his living conditions, and secure the future of his school-going children.

Thanks to the support from Juhudi Kilimo and Kiva lenders, he will be able to build this business and become independent

loans.use: To buld a modern dairy unit

loans.name: Noemy Del Carmen

texts.es:
Nohemy, estudió hasta cuarto grado de básica, está casada y su esposo trabaja con ganado, en la agricultura y en la albañilería, tiene 4 hijos, pero solo una hija vive con ella.

Nohemy, vende ropa en los cantones vecinos, solo tiene un mes de hacerlo y lo aprendio por iniciativa propia para tener un ingreso economico y entretenerse en una actividad productiva; anteriormente vendia en el mercado.

Ella, ocupa el crédito para comprar ropa para vender, con esto ella mejorara mucho su negocio, porque con el prestamo podra comprar al por mayor, para ofrecerles a los clientes mejores precios.

Sus sueños son, aprender bien el negocio para poder darle un mejor futuro a su hija.
texts.en:
Nohemy studied until the fourth year of her basic education. She is married and her husband works with livestock in agriculture and also in construction. She has four children, but only one daughter lives with her. 

Nohemy sells clothing in the neighboring towns. She has only been doing this for one month and learned it through her own initiative, in order to earn money and train herself in a productive activity. Previously she sold in the market. 

She is applying for the loan to buy clothing to sell. With this, she will improve her business greatly because with the loan she will be able to buy wholesale clothing, to offer it to customers at a better price. 

Her dream is to learn the business well in order to provide a better future for her daughter.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to start horticultural farming

loans.name: Noel's Group

texts.en:
Noel is 50 years old and has seven children. She is a group leader and is representing her group formed by 10 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. 

Noel has been farming with One Acre Fund for years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2010. This decision was largely a result of her desire to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods, and although she described her last harvest as poor due to the effects of MLND (maize virus), she believes she could have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund. Noel also decided to purchase a solar light as part of her loan, which she is very excited about, as it will allow her to have light during dark hours for her children to be able to study.

Obtaining this loan means that Noel's Group will be able to receive a total of five solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of 4.5 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Susan's Group

texts.en:
Susan, pictured above, is a group leader and is representing her group, formed by 12 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. She joined One Acre Fund for the first time in 2010 and decided to represent her group because she wanted to spread the story of One Acre Fund farmers. She is married and has one child.

With a portion of this loan, Susan will not only purchase maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvesting season, but also a solar light. Receiving a solar light as part of her loan means that now she will be able to have light during dark hours for her children to be able to study. Susan plans to use the profits she gains this year to send her children to school.

In total Susan’s Group will use the inputs received from this loan to plant a total of 5.5 acres of land. They will also receive a total of 10 solar lights.

loans.use: to buy cost efficient maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvesting season, as well as a solar light.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy small dry fish called dagga to sell.

loans.name: Mgandi

texts.en:
Mgandi is a married woman with two children, both attending school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water.

Mgandi has operated a retail shop business for the past year, selling goat meat in the community. She faces major challenges of competition and transportation in her business. Mgandi will use this 50,000 KES loan to purchase stock of goats for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of goats for resale

loans.name: Winrose

texts.en:
Hello! Meet Winrose, 41 years of age, a very hardworking, honest and dedicated farmer who lives in Tegecha, a remote village in Litein. She is happily married and is blessed with adorable children. She has been practicing mixed farming for the last five years and has gained a great deal of experience.

To afford a decent and comfortable life for her children, she has been selling milk, eggs, and varieties of food crops from her farmland. To make ends meet and make extra cash, she has been engaging in another small personal business. 

The Litein area is very populated, and the demand for poultry products and eggs is very high. Like many farmers from her region, she finds poultry farming very enjoyable, and she stated that the most enjoyable part about poultry farming is “the increased profits I enjoy.” Her biggest challenge, however, is meeting the demand that is really high. She lacks funds to increase her poultry farming, and she is seeking a loan of 20,000 KES (Kenyan shillings) to buy poultry.

Being a woman seeking to access funds is very challenging, but through institutions such as Juhudi Kilimo via Kiva, she feels relieved knowing that her dream will be achieved and that she will be able to buy more poultry. As a result of the loan, she will sell more eggs and poultry products to her neighbors and to the local market, and this will translate to an increased profit margin and an improved income level.

Being a visionary woman, she intends to accumulate more profits and expand her poultry market to other markets; this will increase her income and improve her living conditions. The extra income she will get will be used to fully repay the loan, permanently change her living conditions, and secure the future of her school-going children.

loans.use: to buy poultry

loans.name: Gilma

texts.es: Gracias al crédito brindado doña Gilma compro los diferentes insumos agrícolas que fueron utilizados para dar a sus cultivos de café el debido y adecuado mantenimiento evitando gracias a los foliares, abonos y demás comprados que su cosecha de café se perdiera o fuera afectada por alguna plaga como el ojo de gallo, la roya o que se hubiera deteriorado por el factor clima. La cosecha fue muy exitosa en comparación a otras, la atención a la misma fue en el tiempo adecuado y oportuno, la recolección del grano y la venta del mismo pronta por la cual se siente contenta y muy satisfecha. Ella solicita su segundo crédito nuevamente para invertir en el mismo rubro pues es la fuente de ingresos de la que ella y su familia dependen para cubrir todos los gastos y demás necesidades por lo cual espera ser apoyada en esta nueva ocasión y poder seguir mejorando con su negocio.
texts.en: Thanks to the first loan provided to Gilma, she was able to buy the different agricultural inputs used to give her coffee crop proper and adequate maintenance, to avoid, thanks to the foliage, fertilizer and other purchased materials that her coffee crop be lost or affected by scourge such as the "eye of the rooster," being chewed up or deteriorated by climate. The crop was very successful compared to others. Attention to the crop was adequate and timely, and she was happy and satisfied with the gathering and sale of the beans. She applies for a second loan to again invest it in the same activity, since it is the source of the earnings that her family depends on to cover all expenses and necessities. For this reason she hopes to be supported through this new application and to be able to better her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticides, and payment for labor to assist in the cultivation of coffee

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies for her crafts business.

loans.name: Leonor Mabel

texts.es:
Leonor de 39 años de edad, no fue a la escuela, ella se casó pero su esposo viajó a los Estados Unidos donde se acompañó y perdió la relación que tenía con ella, de ese matrimonio tiene tres hijos a los cuales el padre apoya en su manutención, con Leonor viven su madre, su hermano y su cuñada, pero económicamente solo sus tres hijos dependen de ella.

Leonor se dedica a la venta de helados, especialmente sorbete, ya tiene dos años de dedicarse a este negocio el cual tomó la decisión de ponerlo por iniciativa propia, anteriormente se dedicó a trabajar en agricultura y en fincas de café.
	
Este crédito lo necesita para comprar más cajas de sorbetes para tenerlo disponible a sus clientes, ya que en ocasiones se le acaba muy rápido y no puede satisfacer la demanda.

Su sueño es tener un negocio muy surtido para dales estudios a sus hijos de la mejor manera y que sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Leonor is 39 years old. She did not go to school. She married but her husband traveled to the United States, where he was accompanied and left the relationship he had with her. From this marriage she has three children, whose father supports them in their care. Leonor's mother, brother and sister-in-law live with her, but only her three children depend on her economically. 

Leonor makes a living selling ice cream, especially sorbet. She has already spent two years working in this business, which she decided to start by her own initiative. Previously she worked in agriculture and in the coffee plantations. 

She needs this loan to buy cases for sorbet to have them available for her customers, since at times she sells them very fast and she is not able to satisfy demand. 

Her dream is to have a stocked business to provide an education for her children in the best way so that they can be professionals.

loans.use: to buy more cases for sorbet to make them available for her customers

loans.name: Toba's Group

texts.fr:
Le banc villageois a été créé le06 Février 2010 lors de son inauguration. Les femmes sont  très solidaires entre elles et ont su par le travail d’ensemble développer une solidarité et un esprit de groupe. Elles ont comme activité principale le  petit commerce.

Madame TOBA (assise à l’extrême droite.) est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe, elle est mariée et mère de six enfants dont 01 fille et 05 garçons. Elle est vendeuse d’huile de palme et de patte d’arachide.

Avec ce prêt, elle compte acheter 05 bouteilles d’huile de palme à 15000f la bouteille,  5 sceaux de patte d’arachide à 40000f et du poisson sec 21000f et des huitres à 10500 avec un transport de 9000f. 

Les bénéfices, elle les utilise pour acheter un terrain, 5 chèvres et consolider son épargne.
texts.en:
This Banc Villageois was created and inaugurated on February 6, 2010. Its members are women who share a strong bond of solidarity developed through team work and team spirit. Their main activity is small trade. 

Mrs. TOBA (sitting on the right in the photo) is the featured borrower. She is married with six children, one girl and five boys. She sells palm oil and groundnut paste.

She will use this loan to buy five bottles of palm oil priced at 15,000f each, five buckets of groundnut paste for 40,000f, some dried fish for 21,000f, and some oysters for 10,500f. Transportation will cost 9,000f. 

With her profits, she plans to buy some land and five goats. She will also bolster her savings.

loans.use: to buy five bottles of palm oil priced at 15,000f each, five buckets of groundnut paste for 40,000f, some dried fish for 21,000f, and some oysters for 10,500f, and to pay 9,000f for transportation.

loans.name: Xhemile

texts.en:
Xhemile, 30 years old and the mother of two children, used to work as a hairdresser. She has since stopped working in order to care for her children, but in order to contribute to her family’s income, she tends a greenhouse that she started.

She plants a variety of vegetables for her husband to sell at the market. Her greenhouse is not very large, so her husband also purchases additional vegetables he finds at a low price to sell at a higher price at the market, along with those that she grows.

Xhemile is very happy with her work and has found it to be more profitable than being a hairdresser, along with allowing her to be home more with her family. 

For the first time, she is requesting a loan in order to open a well to add a water irrigation system to her greenhouse. Until now, she has had to borrow water from her neighborhood. She believes that this loan will help her cultivate more and different vegetables and to produce enough for her husband to sell at larger profits.

She also has some land where she plants corn to sell and hopes that in the near future she will be able to have her own small farm. She wants to thank all of the lenders for their support.

loans.use: to open a well to a add water irrigation system to her greenhouse

loans.name: Nemia

texts.en:
Nemia has three sons, but her husband doesn't live with her and the family. Nemia is still living in El Alto, and she pays rent.

Nemia is still selling used clothes to survive. She realized that another loan will help her a lot because she wants to sell more clothes.

Nemia is the only person at her house who makes money, and your support would help her tremendously, as it would enable her to go to many fairs to sell clothes.

loans.use: to buy used clothing for her business.

loans.name: Yrene

texts.es:
Yrene, no estudio, está acompañada y su pareja trabaja con ganado bovino y tambien en la agricultura, tiene 4 hijos, pero no viven en casa porque estan acompañados, con ella solo viven dos nietos.

Yrene, trabaja con ganado bovino desde hace dos años y lo aprendio de su compañero de vida, decidio hacerlo para ayudar economicamente en los gastos de la casa; antes solo se dedicaba a los oficios domesticos, ahora la distancia que camina para ir a cuidar sus animales es de 1 1/2 kilometros de su casa.

Yrene, ocupará el préstamo para cortar la cosecha, le ayudara mucho porque podra recoger su cosechas y preparar alimento para el ganado sin tener preocupaciones.

Sus sueños son ayudar a que su nieta se prepare academicamente.
texts.en:
Yrene has no schooling.  She and her husband, a farmer, have 4 grown children, all of whom live away.  Two of Yrene's grandchildren live with her and her husband.

Yrene has kept cattle for two years, work that she learned from her husband so that she could generate an extra income for the family.  She had only cared for her house and family before so the work was new to her.  She works within 1 1/2 kilometers of her house.

Yrene will use this loan to harvest her feed crop.  The loan will help a lot because she needs the crop to feed her cattle.

Her greatest wish, she says, is to support her granddaughter's schooling.

loans.use: for harvesting her feed crop.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luis  tiene la edad  de 20 años, está soltero, vive con los abuelos actualmente. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de materiales para arreglar y ampliar el vivero, el vende arboles y plantas ornamentales y las distribuye el las comunidades y con ello  espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de el y sus abuelos  y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Luis, 20, is single and lives with his grandparents.  He is applying for a loan that he will use to develop and expand his plant nursery.  He sells trees and ornamental plants to local buyers.  The investment will increase his income and allow him to better provide for himself and his grandparents.  This is his first FUDECOSUR loan.  He has never borrowed from a bank before but FUDECOSUR offered a relatively simple application process and a good interest rate.

loans.use: to expand his plant nursery.

loans.name: Juan De Jesús

texts.es:
Juan de 33 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, luego se dedicó a colaborar en aspectos sociales en su comunidad, está soltero y no tiene hijos.

Desde hace mucho tiempo  Juan se dedicó a prestar servicios como promotor de salud, y esa es la actividad que sigue realizando hasta la fecha, ya tiene 8 años de dedicarse a esto, además le ayudaba a sus padres en los trabajos agrícolas.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar una motocicleta para trasladarse al lugar de su trabajo y visitar  a las personas de su comunidad, ya que su trabajo consiste en  visitar las viviendas de toda su comunidad y en ocasiones tiene que caminar desde las 7:30 AM hasta las 3:30 PM.

Su sueño es montar un negocio dedicado a prestar servicios de organización de bodas, fiestas rosas, cumpleaños etc. para generar ingresos y continuar mejorando sus condiciones de vida, también sueña con una familia pero antes de eso tener las condiciones para que no le falte nada.
texts.en:
33-year old Juan has a high school education. He then did social work in his community. He is single and doesn’t have any children.

For the last eight years Juan has been working as a promotor of healthy lifestyles. He also helps his parents on their farm.

He needs a loan to buy a motocycle so he can travel from his place of work to visit the people in the community. His work entails visiting people in their homes throughout the community. Sometimes he has to walk from 7:30am to 3:30pm. 

Juan’s dream is to start a business organizing weddings, special occasions, birthdays etc. to earn money and continue improving his standard of living. He also dreams of having a family but before that he wishes to be able to be able to support them so they lack for nothing.

loans.use: buy a motorcycle so he can travel from his place of work to visit his clients

loans.name: Olga

texts.en:
Olga has a boyfriend, and they have been together for eight years. Olga has a son and she has her own house. The family live in Achacachi.

Olga sells clothes, and her boyfriend helps her. Olga needs a loan to buy more clothes (hats, t-shirts, and sweaters) to sell because she wants to go to other places such as Batallas and Morocollo, where she knows she can earn much more money.

Olga wants to improve her quality of life, and she hopes you can help her.

loans.use: to buy more clothes (hats, t-shirts, and sweaters) to sell

loans.name: Deiby

texts.es: Deiby  tiene la edad  de 18  años, está soltero, vive con sus padres y una  hermana   que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de unos cerdos y el alimento del mismo, el desea engordas al peso ideal para su posterior venta el espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Deiby, 18, is single and lives with his parents and sister who are, he says, the most important people in the world to him.  Deiby is applying for a loan that he will use to buy pigs and animal feed.  He wants to raise the pigs for market so that he can maximize his profits and provide his family with an extra income.  He also wants to invest a little in the family's next harvest and work towards others of his goals.  This is his first FUDECOSUR loan.  He has never borrowed from a bank before but FUDECOSUR offered a relatively easy application process and a good interest rate.

loans.use: to buy pigs for his animal sales business.

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Aissatou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est composé de 31 femmes très actives dans ce banc villageois créé en Octobre 2010. Elles sont toutes issues du même village et ont une bonne entente entre elles. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Aissatou (assise à l’extrême droite) âgée de 55 ans, est  mère de 04 enfants (3 Garçons et 1 fille et s’active dans le petit commerce.

Avec ce prêt elle compte s’approvisionner en huile  2 bidons 20 litre qu’elle achète à 18000 f et le revend à 1000 f le litre et 02 sac de sucre à 24000 qu’elle revend aussi en détail à 600f le kg.

Les bénéfices de son activité lui permettront d’épargner d’acheter d’autres produits été de soigner ses enfants en cas de maladie
texts.en:
This is a group of 31 women who are very active members of the local Banc Villageois created in October of 2010. They are all from the same village and get along nicely. Their main activity is small trade. 

Mrs. Aissatou (sitting at the far right in the photo) is a 55-year-old mother of four children, three boys and one girl. She works in small trade.
With this loan, she plans to buy two 20-liter jugs of oil for 18,000f to retail at 1,000f per liter, and two sacks of sugar for 24,000f to retail at 600f per kg.

The profits earned through this activity will allow her to bolster her savings, to purchase some needed items, and to care for her children in case of illness.

loans.use: to buy two 20-liter jugs of oil for 18,000f to retail at 1,000f per liter, and two sacks of sugar for 24,000f to retail at 600f per kg.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is a young, ambitious father of one who works as a part-time security guard at a local store in the famous township of South Africa, Soweto. 
Through hard work Samuel has managed to open his own cyber internet cafe and gaming arcade in his neighborhood. He provides services such as printing, copy writing and faxing for people around his location and has two computers that customers can use for internet browsing. His arcade has only two gaming machines that cannot meet the demand created by a nearby primary school. 
He is requesting a loan from kiva to buy two more gaming machines bringing his total to four. These, he says will comfortably meet the demand.  He also intends to buy a pool table to attract a new clientele. Samuel also wants to extend his shop hence wants to buy wood pillars for building a gazebo, which will increase the room’s space as well as divide it into two sections, one for the cyber cafe and the other for the arcade. 
Samuel hopes that these changes will diversify his business allowing him the opportunity to quit employment and focus on building his business. He hopes to have enough income to ably provide for his daughter and serve as an example to the young men in his community.

loans.use: to buy two gaming machines, a pool table and wood pillars.

loans.name: Welner Alexis

texts.es:
Welner, estudio hasta noveno grado, está casado y su esposa trabaja de empleada domestica, tiene dos hijas, pero no viven con él.

Welner, trabaja con ganado bovino de repasto, lo ha hecho por más de 4 años y lo aprendio de su padre para obtener un ingreso extra.- Tambien trabaja de motorista.

La distancia que camina para llegar a donde tiene su ganado es de 1 kilometro, uno de sus primos le ayuda.

Welner, necesita el crédito para comprar ganado de repasto, con esto mejorara su negocio porque tendra más ganado.

Sus sueños son trabajar muy duro, para ofrecerle un mejor futuro a sus hijas.
texts.en:
Welner left school after the ninth grade.  He and his wife, a cleaner, have two children. 

Welner has kept cattle for 4 years.  He learned cattle-rearing from his father and says that the business provides the family with an extra income.  He also works as a driver.

He operates the business within 1 kilometer of his house.  A cousin helps him with the business.

Welner will use the loan to buy more cattle.

For the future, Welner wants to carry on his business so that he can provide his daughters with a better future.

loans.use: to buy cattle for his livestock business.

loans.name: San Antonio De Padua Group

texts.es:
María Petronila es una mujer muy joven de tan solo 21 años de edad  es casada, tiene un hijo de un año, ellos viven en una comunidad de San Antonio Palopo.

María (primera de derecha a izquierda en la fotografía) es una madre de familia que lucha a lado de su esposo para que en su familia tengan lo esencial, pues para que ella pueda aportar en algunos gastos, actualmente se dedica a la venta de frutas ya sea por unidad  o preparada  en bolsas, agregándole otros condimentos, ella se dedica a esta actividad desde hace cinco años, el negocio lo atiende en el mercado de su comunidad. María quiere incrementar ahora el negocio pero lo que le limita es que no cuenta con dinero para hacer la inversión, pues para poder lograr su meta María ha decidió buscar un prestamo,  y precisamente ha buscado la institución ADICLA en donde solicita dos mil quetzales; que lo utilizará para comprar diversidad de frutas y surtir su negoco.

María por ser una persona responsable y se ha destacado desde siempre así por tal razón  que en este prestamo se ha sumado otras personas que lo que buscan también es apoyar en el bienestar de su familia, pues María se siente útil a su comunidad porque de esa manera está contribuyendo con su gente a progresar. Como comenta María el prestamo en grupo nos da ventaja  ya que nos facilita juntar los requisitos.
texts.en:
María Petronila is a very young woman of only 21 years. She is married, she has a one-year-old son. They live in the community of San Antonio Palopo. María (the first from right to left in the photograph) is a mother of a family that strives by the side of her husband so that they have the essentials in her family. Currently, she works selling fruits either whole or prepared in bags, adding other condiments, so that she can support some expenses. Now María wants to increase the business but what limits her is that she doesn't have money to make the investment. In order to achieve her goal, María has decided to search for a loan, and has specifically pursued the ADICLA institution where she is applying for 2,000 quetzales. She will use it to buy a variety of fruits and stock her business.

María, by being a responsible person, has always stood out for this reason. For this loan, she has added other people who are also looking to support the wellbeing of their families. María feels useful to her community because, in this manner, she's contributing with her people to progress. As María comments, "the group loan gives us an advantage since it enables us to gather the requirements."

loans.use: to buy fruits.

loans.name: Diana Beatríz

texts.es:
Diana de 21 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado de educación básica, está acompañada desde hace 3 años, su pareja se dedica al trabajo de seguridad pública, son padres de una niña de 2 años,  y es la única que depende de Diana.

Diana se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenía 15 años, sus padres la llevaban al campo a que aprendiera este trabajo,  además compra y vende ganado y su pareja se involucra en el trabajo para salir adelante y darle lo mejor a su pequeña hija.

Ella solicita este crédito para comprar una yunta de bueyes  ya que le genera buenas ganancias comercializarlos.

Su sueño es sacar adelante a su hija y que les vaya de lo mejor en este negocio de ganado
texts.en:
Diana is 21 years old and studied until the 9th grade. She has been married for 3 years and her partner makes a living in public security work. They are parents to a 2 year old daughter who is the only dependent of Diana. 

Diana has been engaged in agriculture since she was 15 years old. Her parents took her into the field to learn this work. She buys and sells livestock. Her partner is also involved in the work, in order to succeed and give the best to their young daughter.

She is asking for a loan to buy a pair of oxen because it generates good profits to sell them.

Her dream is to raise her daughter and for things to go well for them in the livestock business.

loans.use: to buy a pair of oxen because it generates good profits to sell them.

loans.name: Héctor Manuel

texts.es:
Héctor de 43 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado, actualmente está casado y su esposa se dedica a la sastrería, dos hijos de ellos ya están acompañados y viven en el mismo terreno pero cada quien en su casa, su hijo menor es el único que estudia y depende de Héctor.

Héctor es sastre, tiene muchos años de experiencia realizando esta actividad la cual le ha servido para cubrir con las necesidades económicas del hogar, además trabaja en la agricultura, su esposa se involucra en dichas actividades para mantener juntos el hogar.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar tela, hilos, zippers, botones, para elaborar los uniformes que le han encargado de dos escuelas. 

Él sueña con seguir cultivando la tierra y también tener una sastrería muy reconocida y rentable.
texts.en:
Héctor is 43 years old. He studied until 6th grade. He is married and his wife earns a living in tailoring. Two of their children are already married and live on the same land but each with their own house. His youngest child is the only one that studies and they depend on Héctor.

Héctor is a tailor. He has many years of experience in this job which has helped him cover the financial needs of his household. He also works in farming, his wife is also involved in these jobs to maintain the household together.

He needs the loan to buy fabric, thread, zippers and buttons to make the uniforms that two schools have hired him to make.

His dream is to continue farming land and also to have a well known and profitable tailor's shop.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, zippers and buttons to make the uniforms that two schools have hired him to make.

loans.name: Mehriniso

texts.ru:
Мехринисо жизнерадостная женщина  в возрасте 32 лет. Она живёт в городе Пенджикенте . Она разведена.  У неё один ребёнок, который проживает с ней.  Она занимается вышиванием национальных платьев. Она сама воспитывает своего ребёнка своим собственным трудом. У неё старая швейная машина и она хочет заменить на новую модель, более высокого качества.  
Она хочет получить кредит в «Арванде» для покупки  новой швейной  машины. Мехринисо заранее  благодарит  «Арванд»  за поддержку.
texts.en: Mehriniso is a happy 32-year-old woman. She lives in the town of Pinjikent. She is divorced and has one child, who lives with her. She is involved in embroidering national dresses. She is also raising her child with her own work. Mehriniso has an old sewing machine, which she wants to replace with a new, higher-quality model. She wants to obtain a loan from Arvand to buy a new sewing machine. Mehriniso thanks Arvand for the support in advance.

loans.use: to buy а new sewing machine

loans.name: Sayda Carolina

texts.es: Sayda es microempresaria que tiene la edad de 24 años, acompañada y madre de un bebé que tiene once mes de nacidos, este es la mayor fuerza de motivación para seguir superándose y así ofrecerle mejores condiciones de vida. Ella comercializa productos farmacéuticos en su domicilio, este negocio lo impulsó hace dos años con ayuda financiera de su compañero de vida y de su mamá, es el segundo ciclo que ADIM le brinda el financiamiento para su negocio lo que le ayudo a aumentar y diversificado los productos ofrecidos. El crédito actual lo solicita para la compra de tres vitrinas con el fin de mejorar las condiciones de su negocio.
texts.en: Sayda is a micro-entrepreneur who is 24 years old, in a relationship and mother to an 11 month old baby. This is her main motivation to continue to excel and be able to offer her child better living conditions. She sells pharmaceutical products at her home. She started this business two years ago with the help of her life partner and her mother. This is the second loan from ADIM who is offering the financing for her business which will help her to expand and diversify the products she offers. She requested this loan to buy 3 display cases with the go;a of improving the infrastructure of her business.

loans.use: to buy 3 display cases which will allow her to improve her business.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor de 51 años de edad, desde  hace 20 años está casado y su esposa es Contadora Pública, ha procreado 4 hijos los cuales dos de ellas están estudiando y los otros dos ya son profesionales.
	
Victor es Contador Público, se dedica a la contaduría desde hace 21 años, esto lo realiza en su casa y ha ido obteniendo clientes a quienes les hace la declaración de rentas, esto lo hace en un horario de 8:00 AM a 4:00 PM y trabaja en equipo con su esposa.

Este crédito lo solicita para comprar una computadora y ponerle cielo falso a su oficina contable.

Él sueña con seguir trabajando y que sus hijos terminen sus estudios con éxito.
texts.en:
Víctor is 51 years old. He has been married for 20 years to a Public Accountant. He has four children, two of whom are students while the other two are already working.

Víctor is a Public Accountant. He has worked in accounting for 21 years. He works out of his home and has obtained clients for whom he does tax returns. He works from 8:00am until 4:00pm alongside his spouse.

He is asking for this loan to buy a computer and to install a false cieling in his accounting office.
	
He dreams of continuing with his work and of having his children successfully complete their schooling.

loans.use: buy a computer and to install a false cieling in his accounting office.

loans.name: Bahtiyor

texts.ru:
Бахтиёр молодой и трудолюбивый парень 32 лет.  Он  женат и имеет троих детей. Его жену зовут Матлуба. Она домохозяйка. Бахтиер по профессии мастер по ремонту автомашин. Но в данное время он работает водителем. Он занимается частным извозом грузов. 
Бахтиер хочет расширить свой бизнес и купить новую автомашину марки Лаббо. Но для этого у него не хватает собственных средств.Он обратился в Арванд для получения кредита.Он заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку и доверие!
texts.en: Bahtiyor is a young and hardworking 32-year-old man. He is married and has three children. His wife's name is Matluba. Bahtiyor's profession is an automotive mechanic, but at the present time he works as a driver. He is involved in private deliveries. Bahtiyor wants to expand his business and buy a new Labo model car, but does not have his own money to accomplish this. He came to Arvand to obtain a loan. He thanks Arvand for the support and trust in advance!

loans.use: to buy a new Labo model car to expand his business

loans.name: Policarpo

texts.es:
Policarpo de 60 años de edad, estudió solo primer grado, está casado y vive solo con su esposa la cual trabaja con él en el molino, tienen seis hijos los cuales ya no dependen de ellos pues han formado sus propios hogares.

Policarpo tiene catorce años de tener el servicio de molino de nixtamal, además transporta pasajeros del caserío a la ciudad, decidió poner el molino porque tenían que ir bastante lejos para poder moler pero hoy en día es el único que tiene el servicio en la comunidad.

	
El crédito lo utilizará para reparar su vehículo en el cual hace viajes ya que es una de sus fuentes de ingresos para él y su familia.


En un futuro su sueña con poner una tienda y comprar un vehículo más grande.
texts.en:
Policarpo is 60 years old. He only studied 1st grade. He is married and lives just with his wife who works with him at the mill. They have 6 children who no longer depend on them as they have created their own households.

Policarpo has had his boiled corn mill for 14 years. He also transports passengers from the small village to the city. He decided to start the mill as he used to have to go very far to mill but now he is the only one in the community who has this service.

The loan will be used to repair his vehicle which he uses for making journeys as this is one of his sources of income for himself and his family.

In the future his dream is to start a shop and buy a bigger vehicle.

loans.use: to repair the vehicle which he uses to make journeys as this is one of his sources of income for himself and his family.

loans.name: Fulvia Francisca

texts.es: Fulvia, tiene un grado de estudio de secundaria el cual termino, que por la falta de apoyo financiero no pudo continuar sus estudios. Ella está acompañada y su pareja trabaja como agricultor sembrando café y granos básicos lo cual realiza con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ya que este rubro es la fuente de ingresos económicos en su hogar el cual con mucho sacrificio han fortalecido teniendo dos manzanas de tierra sembrada de café. Ellos tienen dos hijos una niña la cual estudia su tercer año de primaria y la menor quien está en kinder viviendo únicamente ellos en su casa de habitacion. Fulvia manifiesta que toda su vida han dependido de este rubro siendo su mercado para el comercio del mismo, local, intermediarios y dueños de beneficios. Ella se levanta temprano por la mañana para poder atender a sus hijas y su pareja y después acompañar a las mismas a su centro de estudio para poder en ocasiones apoyar a su pareja en el campo pues la distancia que está ubicada su propiedad es de aproximadamente quince kilómetros a la cual se trasladan en carro de paila de la comunidad. Ella solicita crédito para la compra de abono 12-24-12, fertilizantes, formula cafetalera, foliar, pago de mano de obra entre otras para poder asistir muy bien sus cultivos y esperar magníficos resultados en esta nueva temporada. Su sueño, apoyar a sus hijas en sus estudios, sus metas, fortalecer el patrimonio y hacer crecer su negocio para salir adelante y superarse como productora de café.
texts.en:
Fulvia completed one year of secondary education, but was unable to continue her studies due to a lack of financial support.  She is living with her partner who works as a farmer cultivating coffee and basic grains, which he does with great effort and dedication, as this is the source of economic income for the household.  Through much sacrifice, they have improved their 3.5 acres of land that is planted with coffee.  They have two children, a girl who is in her third year of primary school and one who is in kindergarten.  They are the only ones living in their house.  

Fulvia expresses that she has depended on this industry her entire life, and her market is the locals, intermediaries, and owners of processing plants.  She gets up early in the morning to care for her daughters and partner, and then she accompanies them to the study center, to then be able to occasionally help her partner in the fields, which are located a distance of approximately 15 kilometers away.  She gets there in a pickup truck from the community.  She is asking for a loan to buy 12-24-12 blend compost, fertilizers, coffee growing formula, fertilizer absorbed through leaves, and to pay for labor, among other things that help her to be able to take very good care of her crops and wait for magnificent results this season.  Her dream is to help her daughters study, and her goals are to strengthen the value of and grow her business to be able to get ahead and improve as a coffee producer.

loans.use: to buy 14-24-12 blend compost, coffee formula, fertilizer absorbed through leaves, and manual labor.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es:
Jorge, se dedica a plantar diferentes plantas ornamentales y frutales para luego venderlas, de esta manera genera ingresos con los que subsiste con su familia, su negocio tiene más de 15 años de funcionar y no cuenta con un horario establecido. Jorge vive con su esposa de 40 años de edad y sus hijos de 20 y 15 años de edad, todo el núcleo familiar trabaja en el negocio.
Comprará macetas, tierra abonada, bolsas, plantas y semillas, fortalecerá su vivero para tener más variedad de plantas que sean del gusto de sus clientes, espera que las demandas y los nuevos ingresos sean más fluidos para recuperar la inversión en poco tiempo y no tener dificultades para resarcir su deuda. 
Los sueños de Jorge es mantenerse trabajando y que sus hijos finalicen una carrera universitaria.
texts.en: Jorge works planting different ornamental plans and fruit trees to sell, and in this way generates income for his family to live on.  He has been in business for more than 15 years and has no set hours.  Jorge lives with his wife, who is 40 years old, and his children, ages 20 and 15.  The whole family works in the business.  He will buy flowerpots, potting soil, bags, plants and seeds to strengthen his nursery and have a greater variety of plants that his clients will like.  He hopes that the demands and new income will be more fluid, to recuperate his investment in a short time, and not have difficulty in repaying his loan.  Jorge's dreams are to keep working and that his children complete a university degree.

loans.use: to buy flowerpots, potting soil, bags, plants and seeds, and to strengthen his nursery to have more variety of plants that his clients will like.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos es una persona muy reconocida por su comunidad por ser sincero, él tiene 3 hijos, esta familia vive en una comunidad de Sololá. 

Santos es un hombre muy responsable con todo lo que emprende, él se dedica a la agricultura, siembra verduras, él se dedica a esta actividad, porque vive en una área netamente agrícola, y esta activad lo tomo desde pequeño, porque no tuvo acceso a educación y por lo mismo no puede optar otro trabajo, de esta manera Santos genera su economía, Santos tiene mucha experiencia en la agricultura, pero el problema es que no cuenta con suficiente capital para sembrar ya que con las ganancias que genera la siembra tiene que cubrir otras necesidades, Pues la salida para Santos es hacer un prestamo y con lo que genera la cosecha se compromete hacer el pago, ya que santos es una persona sensato.

Santos con este prestamo estaría comprando insumos agrícolas tales como semillas, abono químico y abono orgánico,  él tiene la plena seguridad teniendo todo esto al alcance uno lograra tener buena cosecha, porque se le estaría aplicando justamente en el tiempo estipulado. 
La meta de Santos es generar más ganancias para poder comprar más terrenos  tanto para cultivo como para construir una casa para su familia.
texts.en:
Santos is a well known person in his community because of his sincerity. He has 3 children and his family lives in a community in Sololá. Santos is a very responsible man in all he undertakes.

He works in agriculture, growing vegetables. He does this work as he lives in a very agricultural area and he has done this since he was quite young. He didn't have access to education, so he had no other option but work. Santos generates his money in this way.

Santos has much experience in agriculture but the problem is he doesn't have enough capital to plant. He had to use his profits from his crops to pay for other expenses. So the road forward for Santos is to take a loan and promises to pay it off with the money the harvest generates as Santos is a sensible man.

Santos will use the loan to buy agricultural inputs like seed fertilizer and manure. He is completely confident that having all this at his disposal he will have a good harvest as he is applying it at the perfect time. Santos' goal is to generate more income to buy more land for growing and to build a house for his family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs.

loans.name: Santos Marcos

texts.es:
Santos de 52 años de edad,  no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, está acompañado  y su esposa se dedica a lo doméstico, tiene 5 hijos en este matrimonio de los cuales tres viven con él y se encuentran estudiando.

Santos   se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenía 10  años de edad, este trabajo se lo enseñó su padre para que se defendiera en un futuro con este oficio, el lugar donde trabaja está a una distancia de 20 minutos  y se va a pie, su horario de trabajo es de 6:00 AM hasta las 12:00 del mediodía y sus hijos le ayudan cuando regresan de trabajar.


El crédito lo necesita para pagar a las personas que le ayuden a sacar los cultivos y a desgranar el maíz.

Sus sueños son  seguir cultivando la tierra y tener como llevar el sostén del hogar.
texts.en:
Santos is 52 years old.  He did not have the opportunity to go to school.  He is in a relationship and his wife takes care of the household chores.  He has 5 children from this marriage.  Three of them live with him and they are in school.

Santos has worked in agriculture since he was 10 years old.  His father taught him this work so that he could support himself in the future with this trade.  The place where he works is 20 minutes away and he walks there.  His hours of work are from 6:00AM until 12:00 mid-day and his children help him when they return from work.

He needs the loan in order to pay people to help him harvest the crops and remove the kernels from the corn.

His dreams are to continue cultivating the land and to have enough to sustain his home.

loans.use: to pay people to help him harvest the crops and remove the kernels from the corn

loans.name: Santiago De Jesús

texts.es:
Santiago De Jesús  vive en la cuidad de Managua de donde es originario, labora para una institución del estado de higienista hace cinco año, es casado y tiene a su cargo tres hijos.
Santiago De Jesús está solicitando a la fuente de financiamiento de kiva y ceprodel un crédito para invertirlo en la compra de materiales de construcción como zinc, perlines, soldadura  para la  reparación del techo que esta en mal estado y así darle mayor condiciones a su  familia  y esto le va dar mayor seguridad a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Santiago De Jesús lives in the city of Managua, where he is originally from. He has been working for the past five years at a state institute that is in charge of sanitation. Santiago is married and has three dependent children.

He is requesting a loan from Kiva and CEPRODEL so that he can invest in the purchase of construction materials such as zinc sheets, beams, and soldering supplies in order to repair the roof which is in bad condition. This will provide better conditions for his family and give them greater security in their home.

loans.use: to buy construction materials in order to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Oyqumish

texts.ru:
Ойкумиш  жизнерадостная пожилая  женщина в возрасте 57 лет. Она занимается животноводством в своем доме и имеет в наличии около трёх голов скота. Этому она научилась в детстве у своих родителей и имеет большой опыт. Её муж  Нажмидин, он работает учителем в школе в своём селе. У них двое замечательных  детей. 
Он хочет получит  кредит в «Арванде»   для проведение мероприятия в честь своего внука , который родился не давно. Заранее благодарит «Арванд» за  поддержку.
texts.en:
Oyqumish is a happy, elderly 57-year-old woman. She is involved in animal husbandry at home and has about three heads of livestock. She learned this business from her parents in her childhood and has a lot of experience in it. Her husband, Najmidin, works as a school teacher in their village. They have two remarkable children. 

Oyqumish wants to obtain a loan from Arvand to hold a celebration for her grandson, who was recently born. She thanks Arvand for the support in advance.

loans.use: to hold a celebration for her recently-born grandson

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw material. (fiber).

loans.name: Gayratbek

texts.ru:
Гайратбек молодой и жизнерадостный парень 25 лет. Он родился и живет  в кишлаке  Дахяк Истаравшанского  района в семье  дехканина.  Он  женат и  имеет одного ребенка.  Гайратбек  занимается животноводством и он очень любит животных. Дополнительно он работает на стройке. 
 Гайратбек  хочет приобрести компьютер для брата. Он обратился в Арванд за кредитом.  Гайратбек  заранее благодарит за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en: Gayratbek is a young and happy 25-year-old man. He was born into a farmer's family in the Dahyak village of the Istaravshan district and lives there to this day. He is married and has one child. Gayratbek is involved in animal husbandry and really loves animals. Additionally, he works at a construction site. Gayratbek wants to purchase a computer for his brother. He requested a loan from Arvand for this purchase. Gayratbek is grateful in advance for the support and trust.

loans.use: to buy a computer for his brother

loans.name: Ramon

texts.es:
Ramon tiene 38 años de edad, vive en casa familiar con sus padres en el distrito de Cayaltí que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como pavos, gallinas, patos, cuyes, entre otros. Cuenta con 05 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El destino del préstamo será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como patos, cuyes, gallinas, entre otros, así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para estos. Con esto Ramon espera ofrecer mayor variedad de animales a sus clientes, lo que se verá reflejado en un mayor nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ramon is 38 years old and lives in his family’s home along with his parents. They reside in the District of Cayaltí in Chiclayo Province, which is located in the region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru. The community where Ramon lives is known for trade, agriculture, and livestock breeding.

Ramon raises and sells small animals such as turkeys, chickens, ducks, guinea pigs, and other livestock. He has five years of experience in this business and also has very good personal and work-related references who are from this area. His loan will be used to buy a large quantity of animals such as ducks, guinea pigs, chickens, and other livestock. He will also buy balanced feed for the animals.

With this loan, Ramon hopes to offer a variety of animals to his customers. This will be reflected in a higher level of income, which will help him improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy ducks, guinea pigs, chickens, and balanced animal feed.

loans.name: José Gilberto

texts.es:
José, estudió hasta tercer grado de básica, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domesticos, tiene 3 hijos, pero solo dos viven con él.

José, tiene ganado bovino de repasto, se ha dedicado al cuido de estos animales desde hace más de 10 años y lo aprendio de su padre, porque tambien trabaja la agricultura y la ganadería; antes solo era jornalero.

La distancia que camina para llegar a donde tiene sus animales es de 1 kilometro.

José, necesita el crédito para comprar ganado de repasto y mejor así su negocio, ya que tendrá más ganado y esto le permitira tener mayores ganancias y mejor calidad de vida. 

Sus sueños son, tener vacas lecheras y que su hijo se prepare academicamente.
texts.en:
José studied until 3rd grade of primary school. He is married and his wife works as a homemaker. He has 3 children, but only 2 live with him. 

José has beef cattle. He has made a living raising these animals for more than ten years and he learned from his father. He also works in farming and livestock. Previously, he was only a laborer.

The distance that he walks to get to where he has his animals is 1 kilometer.

José needs the loan to buy beef cattle and thus improve his business, since he will have more cattle, and this will allow him to get better profits, and have a better quality of life.

His dreams are to have dairy cows and that his child is prepared academically.

loans.use: to buy beef cattle.

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es:
Manuel, de 33 años de edad, estudio hasta educación básica, está acompañado y tiene dos hijos, de los cuales solo uno de ellos estudia, el menor tiene apenas tres años de edad y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos.

Manuel, tiene diez años de trabajar como motorista, este trabajo lo obtuvo desde que el dueño de los buses, le pidió que le ayudara a manejar una de sus unidades y desde entonces trabaja como motorista.

El dinero del crédito será para comprar lámina y hierro, para cambiar el techo de su vivienda

El sueño de Manuel, es llegar a tener una vivienda digna, en donde puedan vivir de forma segura y cómoda junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Manuel is 33 years old and studied for his basic education. He is in a relationship and has two children, but only one of them is in school. The younger child is only three years of age. His partner takes care of the household duties.

Manuel has been working as a driver for 10 years. He obtained this job from the owner of some buses who asked him if he would help drive one of the vehicles. Since that time, he has worked as a driver.

The money from this loan will be used to buy metal sheets and iron so that he can replace the roof of his house. Manuel dreams of having a decent home where he can live securely and comfortably with his family.

loans.use: to buy metal sheets and iron so that he can replace the roof of his house.

loans.name: Muattar

texts.ru:
Муаттар жизнерадостная женщина 40 лет. Она замужем и имеет троих детей. Она занимается животноводством. Она очень трудолюбивая женщина и всегда стремится чтобы в её доме был достаток.  В  будущем  хочет заниматься  откормом и куплей продажей скота, для увеличение дохода семьи . Муаттар  помогает её  семья . Накопив нужную сумму хочет построить  коровник. 
  Она хочет расширить своё дело и хочет увеличить поголовье скота. Но для этого её не хватает собственных средств. Она обратилась в МДО Арванд за кредитом. Муаттар благодарит за поддержку и доверие МДО Арванд.
texts.en:
Muattar is a happy 40-year-old woman. She is married and has three children. She is involved in animal husbandry. She is a very hardworking woman, who always tries to have financial stability at home. In the future, she wants to be involved in fattening up and reselling livestock in order to increase her family's income. Muattar's entire family helps her. She wants to build a cowshed once she is able to save a necessary amount of money.

Muattar wants to expand her business and increase her livestock headcount, but does not have enough of her own money to do this. She requested a loan from MDO Arvand. Muattar thanks MDO Arvand for the support and trust.

loans.use: to buy a cow in order to increase her livestock headcount

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy work tools, specifically a polisher, and to pay for the servicing of a soldering machine.

loans.name: Nuri

texts.ru:
Нури трудолюбивая женщина 55 лет. Она живет  в  Истаравшане. Она родилась  в семье рабочего. Она замужем.  Нури  работает медсестрой и получает 668  сомони в месяц. Нури очень спокойная и добрая женщина. Её мужа зовут Гайбулло. Он работает строителем. Они живут дружно в доме, который построили сами. Их дочь учится в университете.
Нури обратилась в МДО Арванд за кредитом для оплаты договора обучения её дочки. Нури заранее благодарит МДО Арванд за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en:
Nuri is a hardworking 55-year-old woman. She lives in Istaravshan. She was born into a worker's family. She is married. Nuri works as a nurse and earns 688 somoni per month. Nuri is a very calm and kind woman. Her husband's name is Gaibullo. He is a construction workers. They live happily in a house that they built themselves. Their daughter attends a university.

Nuri requested a loan from MDO Arvand to pay for her daughter's tuition. Nuri thanks MDO Arvand for the support and trust.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's university education

loans.name: Paraiso Group

texts.es:
Manuela es una mujer que se esfuerza cada día para dar lo mejor a sus hijos, ella tiene 36 años viven en una comunidad de Santo Tomás la Unión, junto a sus cinco hijos y su esposo. 
Manuela (primera de derecha a izquierda en la fotografía) desde muy pequeña salía con sus padres  para ayudarlos en las actividades que ellos realizan, pues por la pobreza nunca  tuvo la oportunidad de ir a la escuela, con los conocimientos adquiridos con sus padres  Pues Manuela siempre vive entusiasmada con  el trabajo que realiza que es la venta de bananos, y con lo que ella produce,  pues gracias al primer prestamo que tuvo en ADICLA ella pudo darle mantenimiento a las plantaciones de banano y como resultado de los trabajos  es la generación de  buena cosecha, pues con el mismo entusiasmo ella solicita nuevamente un prestamo para seguir dándole mantenimiento a las plantaciones para que siga cosechando cada vez mejor. 
Manuela a través de los prestamos ha apoyado mucho a su esposo, para que sus hijos puedan tener lo necesario; lo que Manuela anhela es conseguir este prestamo, para realizar estos trabajos de mantenimiento, para que genere más ganancias y con las ganancias, ella estaría comprando más terrenos para seguir plantando más bananos y otros productos para que siempre cuenten con ingresos. Manuela es una mujer que se destaca por ser extrovertida.
texts.en:
Manuela makes an effort every day to offer her kids the best. She is 36 years old, and lives with her five kids and her husband in a community in Santo Tomas la Union.

Manuela (first from right in the picture) used to help her parents since she was little. She never had the chance to go to school because she was poor.
She learnt from her parents, and she is excited about her job. She sells bananas. She was able to take care of the banana plantation thanks to the first loan she got from ADICLA. As a result of her efforts, the harvest was really good.

She is requesting a new loan to be able to maintain the plantation to get good results every time.

Thanks to the loans, Manuela has been able to support her husband so her kids can have the basic things. She wants the loan to do maintenance work, to make more money, and to be able to buy more land to keep cultivating bananas and other products to get an income.

Manuela is known for being very outgoing.

loans.use: to buy supplies and to pay for the labor for the maintenance of the banana tree(s).

loans.name: Jose Rafael

texts.es:
José, de 22 años de edad, está soltero, no tiene hijos, vive junto a sus dos hermanos y su mamá, su papá los abandonó cuando él era muy pequeño.- Fue gracias a uno de sus tíos que aprendió a cultivar hortalizas y de esa manera ayudaba a su mamá y sus hermanos.

Hoy en día se dedica a cultivar 1,886.58 metros cuadrados de tomate y 3,144.30 metros de maíz, junto a su hermano, de esa manera ellos pueden obtener ingresos, para cubrir la necesidad de su familia. 

José, tiene 6 años de cultivar hortalizas, ya que es el oficio que él aprendió y de donde puede obtener ganancias, para sus gastos personales y poder ayudar a su familia.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar material para construir un invernadero, de esa manera el rendimiento del cultivo será mucho mayor y lo protegerá de algunas plagas.

José, planea en un futuro llegar a construir un invernadero más grande y por su puesto ayudar a su mamá y a sus hermanos.
texts.en:
José is 22 years old, single, and has no children. He lives with his two siblings and his mother. His father abandoned them when he was very young. Thanks to one of his uncles, José learned how to cultivate vegetables, so he is now able to support his mother and siblings.

Today José cultivates 1,886.58 square meters of tomatoes and 3,144.30 square meters of corn with his brother. This allows them to generate income for covering their family’s needs. José has been cultivating vegetables for six years. Upon learning this trade, he has been able to earn an income so that he can pay for his personal expenses and help his family.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy materials for building a greenhouse. This will help him obtain a greater crop yield and protect the plants from pests. In the future, José plans to build a larger greenhouse and also help his mother and his siblings.

loans.use: to buy materials for building a greenhouse.

loans.name: Coumba Amadou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est composé de 31 femmes très actives dans ce banc villageois créé en Octobre 2010. Elles sont toutes issues du même village et ont une bonne entente entre elles. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Coumba assise ( à l’extrême droite) est l’emprunteur vedette du groupe,  âgée de 43 ans et  est mariée et mère de 04  enfants (01 garçon et 03 filles).

Avec ce prêt, elle compte acheter deux sacs de sucre et divers produits alimentaires pour les revendre.

Les bénéfices de son activité lui permettront de développer ses activités et d’assurer le quotidien de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This is a group of 31 women who are very active members of the local Banc Villageois created in October of 2010. They are all from the same village and get along nicely. Their main activity is small trade. 

Mrs. Coumba (sitting at the far right in the photo) is the featured borrower for this group. She is a 43-year-old married mother of four children, one boy and three girls. 

With this loan, she plans to buy two sacks of sugar and various food items for resale. 

The profits earned will allow her to further develop her activities and to provide for her children’s day-to-day well-being.

loans.use: to buy two sacks of sugar and various food items for resale.

loans.name: Sabougnouma Group

texts.fr:
Kiniba Madi est une femme marié, âgé de 40 ans, mère de deux (2) enfants et n’ont pas atteint l’âge normale d’aller  à l’école elle pratique l’activité de stockage de céréales, arachide et mil. Elle n’a pas été à l’école,  marié à un cultivateur. Elle exerce cette activité il y a 5 ans Pour acheter beaucoup de sacs de céréales, elle fait recours au  RMCR pour avoir de l’argent.  Elle achète les céréales dans les foires locales tout comme d’arachide et elle dispose un magasin  pour le stockage elle est souvent confrontée à un problème de chute de prix   (mévente). Les  bénéfices de cette activité lui a permis d’aider son mari de supporter  les charges de la famille.
Kiniba est la femme avec le sac en main au milieu sur la photo.
texts.en: Kiniba Madi is a married woman who is 40 years old and the mother of two (2) children who aren't yet old enough to go to school. She has a grain, peanut and millet stocking business. She didn't attend school and is married to a farmer. She has had her business for 5 years. To purchase a large number of bags of grain, she came to RMCR for funds. She purchases grain at local weekly markets, as well as peanuts, and has a storage space where she keeps it. She often deals with sudden price decreases (slumps). The profits from this business allowed her to assist her husband in paying the family's expenses. Kiniba is the woman with the bag in her hand in the photo.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of grain and peanuts to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer, pesticides, etc. to assist her carrot crops

loans.name: Qoriccoyllor Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “QORICCOYLLOR”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Maria del Pilar ella es soltera y tiene 49 años y tiene 5 hijo; La socia trabaja en su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azucar, leche y galletas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar arroz, azucar, leche y galletas.
La socia que esta pegada a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.
 

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de restaurant, negocio de cabina de internet, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de animales.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: The members in the picture belong to the QORICCOYLLOR communal bank. The bank is located in the Cusco district, part of Cusco Province and Cusco Department. Maria del Pilar is a 49-year-old single mother of five children. She runs a convenience store, selling basic goods such as rice, sugar, milk, and cookies. She works from 8:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. and has had the business for five years now. It is a successful business and Maria's dream is to expand it. She is requesting a loan to buy rice, sugar, milk, and cookies. The group member in the inserted photo was not able to make the group photo as she was working at the time. The other members work in a restaurant business, an internet kiosk, a convenience store, and animal sales. Maria is grateful to everyone who has formed a part of this dream and is committed to making the agreed payments.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk, and cookies for her grocery store.

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es:
EL SEÑOR LUIS ENRIQUE ES UN OBRERO QUE VIVE EN LA CIUDAD DE CONDEGA A UNOS 35 KM AL NORTE DE LA CIUDAD DE ESTELI, ESTA FELIZMENTE CASADO Y TIENE 3 HIJOS LOS QUE YA SON INDEPENDIENTES, EL RESIDE EN SU CASA PROPIA DESDE HACE MAS DE 18 AÑOS. 
ESTE SEÑOR SE DESEMPEÑA COMO OPERADOR DE POZOS EN LA EMPRESA DE ACUEDUCTOS, TIENE UNOS 7 AÑOS DE LABORAR EN DICHA EMPRESA DE MANERA CONTINUA, SIENDO ESTA SU PRINCIPAL FUENTE DE INGRESO PARA EL SOSTÉN FAMILIAR.
ESTE SEÑOR SE PRESENTO A LAS OFICINAS DE CEPRODEL PARA SOLICITAR UN CRÉDITO PARA LA COMPRA DE BLOQUES Y HIERRO PARA TERMINAR DE CONSTRUIR SU CASA DE HABITACIÓN YA QUE SUS INGRESOS NO SON LOS SUFICIENTES COMO PARA REALIZAR ESTOS GASTOS POR CUENTA PROPIA, EL SE MUESTRA POSITIVO Y ESPERA QUE EL CREDITO LE SEA OTORGADO PARA LLEVAR A CABO LA COMPRA DE LO MATERIALES Y ESPERA IR MEJORANDO POCO A POCO SU CASA Y ASI LOGRAR TENER UNA VIVIENDA DIGNA.
texts.en: Luis Enrique is a worker who lives in the city of Condega, 35km north of Esteli. He is happily married and has 3 independent children. He has lived in his own home for more than 18 years.
